Item_gift_1001.name: Flower bouquet
Item_gift_1001.description: A nicely presented batch of flowers and a prime gift choice, though watch out for those who are allergic to pollen or dislike plants. The flowers are produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_1002.name: Dumbbells
Item_gift_1002.description: An instrument for weight training and mostly used for fitness—except in certain drastic situations... Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1003.name: Nice picture frame
Item_gift_1003.description: Specifically made for safekeeping precious photos, thus built from special materials and difficult to take apart. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_1004.name: Postcard of Aida
Item_gift_1004.description: Shows different landscapes on Aida. Despite Omnium radiation pollution and other adverse conditions, there is still scenery worth preserving. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1005.name: Wool scarf
Item_gift_1005.description: It's supposed to be made of processed wool, but since that is now obsolete, the "wool" is actually a composite material. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1006.name: Custom poker deck
Item_gift_1006.description: No one knows who created this deck, but judging from the rules of play, the maker must have been a very interesting fellow. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1007.name: Mini potted plant
Item_gift_1007.description: Miniature potted plant. Please note that the plant is artificial and needs no conventional care. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1008.name: Retro harmonica
Item_gift_1008.description: For playing lovely melodies. It's hard to come by, so only a few people on Aida can actually play one. Nowadays, that's probably limited to the true music aficionados. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1009.name: Paper pinwheel
Item_gift_1009.description: A plain toy that couldn't be more ordinary, but nonetheless has never failed to bring comfort and joy. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1010.name: Snack box
Item_gift_1010.description: Snack box created by Fennie on Astra, containing various irresistible munchies. A very popular gift across all sectors. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1011.name: Moonflower Ornament
Item_gift_1011.description: A model ornament made with the moon flower as a prototype. After conducting an ecological transformation program for some time, the buds of the moon flower were found for the first time on a gobi in Vera.

Item_gift_2001.name: Tool set
Item_gift_2001.description: Designed for practical purposes and is ready to use. May also be applied as spare parts. Receives a big thumbs-up from technicians for its versatility. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2002.name: Chess set
Item_gift_2002.description: A game for two players, though some people actually prefer playing by themselves. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2003.name: Plush toy
Item_gift_2003.description: Kids' favorite plush toy. Adorable with a scent reminiscent of a warm day under the sun. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2004.name: Tailor-made suit
Item_gift_2004.description: Custom-made suit, finer and suaver than the common variety, with accessories to boot. Those with dramatic flair should like it. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2005.name: Vitamin pack
Item_gift_2005.description: Wellness supplement. A necessity for those working too long or too indulged in playing games to have proper meals. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2006.name: Gem necklace
Item_gift_2006.description: How much is this gem necklace worth? Forget all the speculations and just keep this valuable safe! Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2007.name: Cat throw pillow
Item_gift_2007.description: A throw pillow in the shape of a cat. Very relaxing and therapeutic to hold. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2008.name: Coloring book
Item_gift_2008.description: The seller said once all the pages have been colored in, you can trade it in for a brand new one. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2009.name: Meteorite in a bottle
Item_gift_2009.description: Meteorite in a clear bottle. The meteorite seems to be a space rock that's not burned out and some sort of mineral mixture giving off a faint glow. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2010.name: Perfume bottle
Item_gift_2010.description: Lovely, elegant glass vial with pleasantly scented liquid inside. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2011.name: Tartarus ornament
Item_gift_2011.description: A miniature figure allegedly takes after the form of Tartarus. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2012.name: New Kalka ornament
Item_gift_2012.description: Receiving a flood of complaints protesting the discontinued production of the old Kalka figure, the makers decided to offer a new version. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2013.name: Mad Dumont figurine
Item_gift_2013.description: Nobody knows when the fad for the Mad Dumont figurine began, except everyone wants one all of a sudden. Produced in Aesperia, Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2014.name: Moonrabbit kit
Item_gift_2014.description: Assembly required. Based on the image of moonrabbit. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2015.name: Spirit Princess figurine
Item_gift_2015.description: Miniature figurine based on Spirit Princess, the smart servant. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2016.name: Mirroria Toy Bricks
Item_gift_2016.description: The Mirroria pocket model has a high level of craftsmanship.

Item_gift_2017.name: Rabbit Throw Pillow
Item_gift_2017.description: A throw pillow in the shape of a rabbit. It's very relaxing and therapeutic to hold it.

Item_gift_3001.name: New game console
Item_gift_3001.description: New high-end game console, designed by a computer genius. The high production cost has caused its shortage. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3002.name: Snow globe
Item_gift_3002.description: Originated in the Warren Snowfield, it reflects pure driven snow during winter. It's now been remade into a household decoration. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3003.name: Music box
Item_gift_3003.description: A metal music box. Not sure if its previous owner broke it or what, but the pleasant tune has been shut off somehow. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3004.name: Silver cookware
Item_gift_3004.description: An expensive-looking complete set of cookware. Supposedly it was owned by a neurotic chef who never let anyone touch these precious tools. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3005.name: Aida comic
Item_gift_3005.description: Depicts the adventures of Tata on Aida in monthly issues. The limited quantity and popularity have led to fights over the comic book every release. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3006.name: Banges specialty
Item_gift_3006.description: Contains various specialties from Banges, each box a random selection to represent local diversity. Of course, that means you never know exactly what you're going to get. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3007.name: 3d Hykros puzzle
Item_gift_3007.description: A puzzle that's sweeping Hykros. The novel appearance and gameplay are nothing but fun. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3008.name: Warren fossil
Item_gift_3008.description: Ancient remains sealed in ice, discovered in Warren Snowfield. Very rare and highly collectible. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_3009.name: Crown token
Item_gift_3009.description: Limited commemorative coins minted by Crown with a portrait of the mines' owner on the front and a stylized "K" on the back. Collect seven of these babies and get a day off with pay—maybe. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_3010.name: Limited Tata figurine
Item_gift_3010.description: Limited collectible figurine, an Aida comic memorabilia. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3011.name: Metal Alf figurine
Item_gift_3011.description: To fully resemble the original Alf, the makers made this one out of metal. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3012.name: Smarty doll
Item_gift_3012.description: A toy based on the image of Smarty. The makers replaced the artificial plant on its head with a live plant, making it highly collectible. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3013.name: Limited Peanut figurine
Item_gift_3013.description: Very rare miniature figurine with data storage and volume control features. Since it's based on the feline Peanut, it's popular among cat lovers. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3014.name: Void Angel figurine
Item_gift_3014.description: A miniature figurine based on the Void Angel. It's white all over and requires special care to keep spotless. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3015.name: Angela ornament
Item_gift_3015.description: A miniature replica of Angela, the smart servant, that even includes the pair of cute pink wings on her back. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3016.name: Ultimate Warrior Otter
Item_gift_3016.description: Designed for the 40th anniversary of the Ultimate Warrior Battlefield: Ultimate Warrior Battlefield 40 is now available. Buy it now and get limited merchandise of the powerful SSR Otter.

Item_gift_3017.name: School Idol Albis
Item_gift_3017.description: The No.1 best-selling figurine in Mirroria. At first glance, there is always a sense of resemblance. It is said to be made on the basis of a highly popular administrator of Mirroria, but the creator denied this saying.

breakthrough_show_abcd1.name: Random weapon augment kit
breakthrough_show_abcd1.source: Random chance of getting nano coating I, acidproof glaze I, booster frame I, nanofiber frame I.

breakthrough_show_abcd2.name: Random weapon augment kit
breakthrough_show_abcd2.source: Random chance of getting nano coating II, acidproof glaze II, booster frame II, nanofiber frame II.

breakthrough_show_abcd3.name: Random weapon augment kit
breakthrough_show_abcd3.source: Random chance of getting nano coating III, acidproof glaze III, booster frame III, nanofiber frame III.

breakthrough_show_bd1.name: Random weapon augment kit
breakthrough_show_bd1.source: Random chance of getting acidproof glaze Ior nanofiber frame I.

breakthrough_show_bd2.name: Random weapon augment kit
breakthrough_show_bd2.source: Random chance of getting acidproof glaze II or nanofiber frame II.

breakthrough_show_bd3.name: Random weapon augment kit
breakthrough_show_bd3.source: Random chance of getting acidproof glaze III or nanofiber frame III.

weapon_show_sr.name: Random SR Weapon
weapon_show_sr.description: Possible Rewards: Thunderous Halberd, Staff of Scars, The Terminator, Pummeler, and Nightingale's Feather.
weapon_show_sr.source: May obtain a random SR weapon

weapon_show_ssr.name: Random SSR Weapon
weapon_show_ssr.description: Possible Rewards: Rosy Edge, Icewind Arrow, Absolute Zero, Scythe of the Crow, Chakram of the Seas, Negating Cube, Dual EM Stars, Thunderblades, Molten Shield V2.
weapon_show_ssr.source: May obtain a random SSR weapon

matrix_show_sr.name: Random SR Matrix chip
matrix_show_sr.description: Possible Rewards: Robarg: Matrix, Apophis: Matrix, Frost Bot: Matrix, Sobek: Matrix, Barbarossa: Matrix, Pepper: Matrix, Hilda: Matrix, Ene: Matrix, Bai Ling: Matrix, Echo: Matrix.

matrix_show_ssr.name: Random SSR Matrix chip
matrix_show_ssr.description: Possible Rewards: Meryl: Matrix, Tsubasa: Matrix, Cocoritter: Matrix, KING: Matrix, Shiro: Matrix, Zero: Matrix, Samir: Matrix, Huma: Matrix, Crow: Matrix.

matrix_show_SR1.name: Robarg: Matrix
matrix_show_SR1.source: Three-set bonus: When a target is shattered, poison the target and deal damage equal to 45%/56%/67.5% of ATK every second for 10 seconds.

matrix_show_SR2.name: Apophis: Matrix
matrix_show_SR2.source: Three-set bonus: Deal higher damage at lower HP. Deal maximum damage when HP is 20%. The damage can be increased by up to 20%/25%/30%.

matrix_show_SR3.name: Frost Bot: Matrix
matrix_show_SR3.source: Three-set bonus: When HP is below 40%, using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon restores HP equal to 160%/200%/240% of ATK.

matrix_show_SR4.name: Sobek: Matrix
matrix_show_SR4.source: Three-set bonus: Increase damage dealt by 6%/7.5%/9% for each enemy nearby. Up to 3 stacks.

matrix_show_SR5.name: Barbarossa: Matrix
matrix_show_SR5.source: Three-set bonus: Upon switching to the weapon, gain 50%/62.5%/75% damage reflection for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds. Upon switching to another weapon, gain a 20%/25%/30% damage boost for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

matrix_show_SR6.name: Pepper: Matrix
matrix_show_SR6.source: Three-set bonus: Increase the speed of obtaining weapon charge by 10%/12.5%/15%.

matrix_show_SR7.name: Hilda: Matrix
matrix_show_SR7.source: Three-set bonus: Increase ATK by 15%/19%/22.5% when there are no enemies within 6 meters.

matrix_show_SR8.name: Ene: Matrix
matrix_show_SR8.source: Three-set bonus: When dealing damage greater than 100% of ATK, deal additional damage equal to 60% of ATK. Cooldown: 3 seconds.

matrix_show_SR9.name: Bai Ling: Matrix
matrix_show_SR9.source: Three-set bonus: Increase damage dealt to grievous targets by 12%/15%/18%.

matrix_show_SR12.name: Echo: Matrix
matrix_show_SR12.source: Three-set bonus: Using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon grants 80/100/120 weapon charge.

matrix_show_SSR1.name: Meryl: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR1.source:
Two-set bonus: If HP is less than 30% after being attacked, gain a shield equal to 20%/26%/32%/40% of Max HP for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds.
Four-set bonus: During the effect of the shield, restore HP equal to 60%/75%/90%/105% of the damage dealt. The max HP restored every 0.5 seconds should not exceed 105%/127.5%/150%/172.5% of ATK.

matrix_show_SSR2.name: Tsubasa: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR2.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase damage dealt by 12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% when there are no enemies within 4 meters.
Four-set bonus: Upon a headshot or hitting the target with Icewind Arrow: Piercing Shot, increase ATK by 15%/18%/21%/25% for 8 seconds.

matrix_show_SSR3.name: Cocoritter: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR3.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase the healing capability and healing effect received by 10%/12%/14%/16%.
Four-set bonus: When you or your teammates are healed, increase ATK by 12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% for 6 seconds.

matrix_show_SSR4.name: KING: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR4.source:
Two-set bonus: For every 10% shatter applied to a target, increase damage dealt by 4%/5%/6%/7% for 25 seconds, up to 3 stacks.
Four-set bonus: When there are 3 or more enemies around, restore HP equal to 10%/12%/13%/14% of damage dealt. The maximum amount of HP restored per 0.5 seconds can not exceed 30%/33%/34.5%/36% of ATK.

matrix_show_SSR5.name: Cobalt-B: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR5.source:
Two-set bonus: Restore 1 dodge attempt every 4 dodges. Dodge attacks burn targets, dealing damage equal to 13%/17%/21%/25% of ATK every second for 10 seconds.
Four-set bonus: Increase damage against debuffed targets by 13%/17%/21%/25%.

matrix_show_SSR6.name: Claudia: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR6.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase damage by 13%/17%/20%/23% when hitting a target in mid-air or initiating an aerial attack. Reset double-jump upon hitting the target in mid-air.
Four-set bonus: Hitting an enemy with a skill reduces the cooldowns of all weapon skills by 1.5/2/2.5/3 seconds and increases the damage of discharge skills by 36%/45%/54%/63% for 15 seconds.

matrix_show_SSR7.name: Shiro: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR7.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase both damage and shatter to targets with more than 50% HP by 15%/19%/22.5%/26%.
Four-set bonus: Upon entering battle, gain a 20%/25%/30%/35% damage boost for 35 seconds. Reset 5 seconds after exiting battle.

matrix_show_SSR8.name: Zero: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR8.source:
Two-set bonus: Upon using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon, gain a shield equal to 120%/150%/180%/210% of ATK for 4 seconds.
Four-set bonus: While the shield is active, you and your teammates deal 16%/20%/24%/28% more damage.

matrix_show_SSR9.name: Samir: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR9.source:
Two-set bonus: Deal more damage upon hitting a target, each time by 1.5%, up to 10/13/16/20 stacks. Buff stacking time: 2 seconds.
Four-set bonus: Each attack onto locked-on targets deals extra damage equal to 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5% of ATK.

matrix_show_SSR10.name: Huma: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR10.source:
Two-set bonus: Hitting targets with dodge skills inflicts bleed, dealing damage equal to 15%/19%/22.5%/26% of ATK every second for 5 seconds.
Four-set bonus: Reduce ATK of all targets within 8 meters that are taking damage over time by 10%/12%/13%/15%.

matrix_show_SSR11.name: Crow: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR11.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase crit damage to targets with less than 60% HP by 33%/42%/50%/58%.
Four-set bonus: Crits deal additional damage over time equal to 12%/15%/18%/21% of ATK every second for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

Vera_huiyu.name: Grayspace Scriptures
Vera_huiyu.description: Used to observe the position of Grayspace Entities and help Wanderers to identify the entrance to the Grayspace.

Item_VeraBuff_Gold.name: Gold Accelerator
Item_VeraBuff_Gold.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the acquisition of gold.
Item_VeraBuff_Gold.source: When used, it drops an additional 350 gold upon defeating Vera enemies, lasting for 10 times.

Item_VeraBuff_Superpower.name: Active Ore Collector
Item_VeraBuff_Superpower.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can improve the acquisition of activator blocks.
Item_VeraBuff_Superpower.source: When used, it drops 1–2 additional activator blocks upon breaking elemental ore, lasting for 5 times

Item_VeraBuff_CoreExp.name: Engine Builder
Item_VeraBuff_CoreExp.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the number of engine parts acquired.
Item_VeraBuff_CoreExp.source: When used, it drops 1-2 additional universal combat parts upon defeating Vera enemies, lasting for 8 times.

Item_VeraBuff_Crystal.name: Cluster Refiner
Item_VeraBuff_Crystal.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the acquisition of clusters.
Item_VeraBuff_Crystal.source: When used, it drops 1-2 additional clusters upon defeating Vera enemies, lasting for 10 times.

Item_VeraBuff_WeaponExp.name: Forge Accelerator
Item_VeraBuff_WeaponExp.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can improve the acquisition of weapon EXP.
Item_VeraBuff_WeaponExp.source: When used, it drops 1-2 additional Weapon battery II upon defeating Vera enemies, lasting for 8 times.

Item_VeraBuff_MatrixExp.name: Drill Accelerator
Item_VeraBuff_MatrixExp.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can improve the acquisition of Matrix EXP.
Item_VeraBuff_MatrixExp.source: When used, it drops 1-2 additional Matrix data pack II upon defeating Vera enemies, lasting for 8 times.

Item_VeraBuff_EleMine.name: Elemental Ore Refiner
Item_VeraBuff_EleMine.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the acquisition of elements.
Item_VeraBuff_EleMine.source: When used, it drops 1-2 additional Elemental Ore shards upon defeating Vera enemies, lasting for 20 times.

Item_VeraBuff_Food.name: Gathering Accelerator
Item_VeraBuff_Food.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the acquisition of food ingredients.
Item_VeraBuff_Food.source: When used, the drop rate of ingredients is increased upon defeating Vera enemies, lasting for 20 times.

Item_VeraBuff_Exp.name: Training Accelerator
Item_VeraBuff_Exp.description: Special item provided by the Navigation station. When used, it can speed up the acquisition of EXP for the Executor.
Item_VeraBuff_Exp.source: When used, EXP gain is increased by 200% upon defeating Vera enemies, lasting for 30 times.

Item_Vera_Gun1.name: Inescapable
Item_Vera_Gun1.description: Special operations gun equipped with Cryo Bullets
Item_Vera_Gun1.source: Reduce the target's speed by 25% for 10 seconds. The target will freeze for 3 seconds after stacking three layers of effects.

Item_Vera_Gun2.name: Welcome from Lilliput
Item_Vera_Gun2.description: Special operations gun equipped with Shrink Bullets
Item_Vera_Gun2.source: Reduce the target's size for 10 seconds. After shrinking, it is likely to get stuck in strange places, which can be solved by transmitting or using Unstuck.

Item_Vera_Gun3.name: Snail Crawling
Item_Vera_Gun3.description: Special operations gun equipped with Deceleration Bullets
Item_Vera_Gun3.source: Reduce the target's speed by 50% for 10 seconds.

Item_Vera_Gun4.name: Stimulant Mushroom
Item_Vera_Gun4.description: Special operations gun equipped with Acceleration Bullets
Item_Vera_Gun4.source: Increase the target's speed by 50% for 10 seconds.

Item_Vera_Gun5.name: Vertigo
Item_Vera_Gun5.description: Special operations gun equipped with Paralyzing Bullets

Item_Vera_Gun6.name: Brain Fog
Item_Vera_Gun6.description: Special operations gun equipped with Narcotic Bullets
Item_Vera_Gun6.source: Blurs the target's vision for 10 seconds.

Item_Vera_Gun7.name: Naysayers
Item_Vera_Gun7.description: Special operations gun equipped with Chaos Bullets

Item_Vera_Gun8.name: Puppizer Shape-Shifting Gun
Item_Vera_Gun8.description: Special operations gun equipped with a Doggie Miniature Simulacrum Simulator
Item_Vera_Gun8.source: Briefly turns the target into Doggie.

Item_Vera_Gun9.name: Kittenizer Shape-Shifting Gun
Item_Vera_Gun9.description: Special operations gun equipped with a Kitty Miniature Simulacrum Simulator
Item_Vera_Gun9.source: Briefly turns the target into Kitty.

Item_Vera_Gun10.name: Sweetie Shape-Shifting Gun
Item_Vera_Gun10.description: Special operations gun equipped with a Sweetie Miniature Simulacrum Simulator
Item_Vera_Gun10.source: Briefly turns the target into Sweetie.

Item_Vera_Gun11.name: Giggs Shape-Shifting Gun
Item_Vera_Gun11.description: Special operations gun equipped with a Giggs Miniature Simulacrum Simulator
Item_Vera_Gun11.source: Briefly turns the target into Giggs.

Item_Vera_Gun12.name: Tata Shape-Shifting Gun

Item_Cooking_2017_autouse.description: Why don't you have some while vegging by the campfire in cold winter?

Item_Cooking_2018_autouse.name: Pine cocoa
Item_Cooking_2018_autouse.description: Nut-flavored cocoa milk. Nut lovers can add more nuts to it.

Item_Cooking_2019_autouse.name: Nut tea
Item_Cooking_2019_autouse.description: Smell how fresh the nuts are...

Item_Cooking_2020_autouse.name: Purple yam pie
Item_Cooking_2020_autouse.description: Filling pie and portable enough for long hikes.

Item_Cooking_2021_autouse.name: Snow lotus soup
Item_Cooking_2021_autouse.description: Snow lotus tastes rather bland, so sugar is added to make it a popular dessert.

Item_Cooking_2022_autouse.name: Truffle fried rice
Item_Cooking_2022_autouse.description: Stir-fry the truffle, then mix it with fried rice.

Item_Cooking_2023_autouse.name: Caterpillar fungus noodles
Item_Cooking_2023_autouse.description: Am I at the age when I have to watch my diet?

Item_Cooking_2024_autouse.name: Caviar sushi
Item_Cooking_2024_autouse.description: A visually pleasant roll makes it a classy dish. If you can't make it, you're better off mixing them in a bowl.

Item_Cooking_2025_autouse.name: Caviar potato balls
Item_Cooking_2025_autouse.description: Soft potato balls drenched in premium caviar. You'll want seconds.

Item_Cooking_2027_autouse.name: Steak with mushroom sauce
Item_Cooking_2027_autouse.description: I think I'm seeing steaks flying across the sky...

Item_Cooking_2029_autouse.name: Juicy meat sandwich
Item_Cooking_2029_autouse.description: Take your time and make yourself a good breakfast!

Item_Cooking_2030_autouse.name: Salmon sashimi
Item_Cooking_2030_autouse.description: This is what food should taste like!

Item_Cooking_2031_autouse.name: Snail baked rice
Item_Cooking_2031_autouse.description: Looks like a weird fusion, but much tastier than it looks.

Item_Pumpkin.name: Pumpkin
Item_Pumpkin.description: Pumpkin is a popular, delicious fruit.

Item_Dandelion_001.name: Dandelion
Item_Dandelion_001.description: When the white petals are scattered to the four winds, I shall take my leave.

Item_Dandelion_zhongzi.name: Dandelion seed
Item_Dandelion_zhongzi.description: Has potential to grow into a new plant after leaving the original.

Item_Bug_001.name: Firefly
Item_Bug_001.description: Captured and released in the night for Celine. A dancing glow in the darkness.
Item_Bug_001.source: Used for the Gorgeous Starry Sky mission.

Item_Honey_001.name: Honey
Item_Honey_001.description: Everybody's favorite sweet. Only the bees have to work hard.

Item_Honey_002.name: Bee nectar
Item_Honey_002.description: Everybody's favorite sweet. Only the bees have to work hard.

Item_Egg_001.name: Poultry egg
Item_Egg_001.description: So, guess it's going to be a chick or a baby hawk? Hey, are you hungry?

Item_Milk_001.name: Milk
Item_Milk_001.description: A common beverage, ready to drink and may be stored for a while. A nutritious fave.

Item_Milk_002.name: Expired milk
Item_Milk_002.description: Milk can be kept for a while, but not this way...

Item_Shell_001.name: Conch
Item_Shell_001.description: Legend has it a beautiful, kind girl lives inside. And it tastes pretty good.

Item_Shell_002.name: Scallop
Item_Shell_002.description: One of the primary food source for coastal dwellers. Already seasoned with sea salt, just grill and serve.

Item_Shells_003.name: Carrion snail
Item_Shells_003.description: A rare variety of giant snail with a weird appetite, but is surprisingly tasty.

Item_Shells_005.name: Hermit crab
Item_Shells_005.description: It has grown again! And now it gets a new... steamy "house."

Item_Meat_001.name: Game meat
Item_Meat_001.description: The more the beast moved, the better the meat.

Item_Meat_002.name: Poultry meat
Item_Meat_002.description: You've had scrambled eggs, right? This is to make it a matching course.

Item_Meat_003.name: Rear hock
Item_Meat_003.description: Delicious when grilled or roasted. Goes well with mustard.

Item_Meat_004.name: Prime cut
Item_Meat_004.description: The more the beast moved, the better the meat.

Item_Meat_005.name: Fatty cut
Item_Meat_005.description: The less the beast moved, the fattier the meat.

Item_Greens_001.name: Lettuce
Item_Greens_001.description: You want to be healthy? Eat it.

Item_Greens_0011.name: Spinach
Item_Greens_0011.description: Spinach turning yellow from sitting out too long. A special cooking method is required for full effect.

Item_Greens_002.name: Wild cabbage
Item_Greens_002.description: It resembles a ball, but that doesn't mean you can kick it like one.

Item_Greens_003.name: Broccoli
Item_Greens_003.description: Nutritious, and every kid loves it.

Item_Mushroom_001.name: Mushroom
Item_Mushroom_001.description: Fungi seen in wild grasslands. Young lasses just love to pick them.

Item_Mushroom_0011.name: Moldy mushroom
Item_Mushroom_0011.description: I think fungi are growing on our fungi...

Item_Mushroom_002.name: Suncap
Item_Mushroom_002.description: Sprouts towards the sun only after raining. Supposedly tastes like sunshine.

Item_Mushroom_004.name: Firecap
Item_Mushroom_004.description: Seems to be a variety of woodear fungus transformed by elements of flame. Tastes rather spicy.

Item_Mushroom_005.name: Monkey head mushroom
Item_Mushroom_005.description: Bland in both taste and appearance, but allegedly very high in nutrients.

Item_Mushroom_006.name: Black truffle
Item_Mushroom_006.description: Rare and expensive mushroom that grows in rather specific, stringent environments.

Item_Mushroom_007.name: Ghost mushroom
Item_Mushroom_007.description: Fungi indigenous to caves. You'll be seeing stars after massive consumption.

Item_Staples_001.name: Homi grain
Item_Staples_001.description: Gift from the earth. Soft, sweet, and delicious when cooked.

Item_Staples_0011.name: Spotted grain
Item_Staples_0011.description: Slightly moldy homi grain, barely edible with careful preparation.

Item_Staples_002.name: Brown rice
Item_Staples_002.description: An offshoot of homi grain that contains the power of the flame element.

Item_Staples_003.name: Potato
Item_Staples_003.description: Tastes great when baked, but eating too much of it won't make you pleasant around other people.

Item_Staples_005.name: Purple yam
Item_Staples_005.description: A variety of potatoes that were exposed to radiation. Extremely nutritious.

Item_Fishes_001.name: Silver bass
Item_Fishes_001.description: Silver bass can be found in either freshwater or the sea. They are meaty and delicious.

Item_Fruit_001.name: Fallen fruit
Item_Fruit_001.description: Fruit fallen to the ground. Edible if you clean the mud off.

Item_Fruit_002.name: Strawberry
Item_Fruit_002.description: Don't wait for it to ripen, or it would be eaten by wild animals long before that.

Item_Fruit_003.name: Phosphogranate
Item_Fruit_003.description: After the initial sour-sweet taste comes... blandness, yet it's a waste to throw it away.

Item_Fruit_004.name: Firedragon fruit
Item_Fruit_004.description: Upgraded dragon fruit with double nutrients, though eating too much of it makes you aggressive.

Item_Follows002.name: Snow azalea
Item_Follows002.description: Extremely high in medicinal value without side effects. Consume as much as you want.

Item_Fruits008.name: Lard gourd
Item_Fruits008.description: Tastes pretty good, actually, despite the irradiated appearance.

Item_Nuts004.name: Walnut shell
Item_Nuts004.description: Eat more of it if you want to become smarter.

Item_Follows001.name: Snow lotus
Item_Follows001.description: Whoa! What a big ole white cabbage!

Item_Staples006.name: Barley
Item_Staples006.description: No one's farming anymore, leaving it to grow in the wild as it may.

Item_Greens011.name: Black moss
Item_Greens011.description: Grows on the exposed cliff face. It's edible, at least.

Item_Nuts003.name: Pinecone
Item_Nuts003.description: An apple might not be the only thing that drops on your head. It could be a pinecone.

Item_Greens010.name: Peat moss
Item_Greens010.description: The best choice for detox, though it has a weird taste.

Item_Shells009.name: Barnacle
Item_Shells009.description: Looks scary, but yummy to the tongue!

Item_Fishes006.name: Dabry's sturgeon
Item_Fishes006.description: Sturgeon living in shallow waters. Small in size, great for braising or stew.

Item_Fishes005.name: Lake bass
Item_Fishes005.description: This fish is good any way you cook it.

Item_Nuts002.name: Cocoa beans
Item_Nuts002.description: Do you anticipate chocolate when you see the cocoa beans too?

Item_Nuts001.name: Hazelnut
Item_Nuts001.description: A certain account pegs this as the culprit of the cracking of tectonic plates during Ice Age.

Item_Greens009.name: Fish mint
Item_Greens009.description: If you can stand the taste, you can't get enough of it.

Item_Greens008.name: Fiddlehead
Item_Greens008.description: Time to eat your veggie! Won't grow tall if you're finicky!

Item_Greens007.name: Laver
Item_Greens007.description: A variety of kelp. Easily washed ashore by waves.

Item_Shells008.name: Oyster
Item_Shells008.description: A favorite of the luminaries in the city. Rumors circulate about it having special effects.

Item_Shells007.name: Sea urchin
Item_Shells007.description: A delicacy from the shallow edge of the sea, though not for everyone.

Item_Shells006.name: Portunid
Item_Shells006.description: Lives on the shallow edge of the sea and sometimes comes ashore to soak up the sun. Very delicious.

Item_Fruits009.name: Balloon fruit
Item_Fruits009.description: The matured form goes wherever the wind takes it.

Item_Fruits006.name: Thornmato
Item_Fruits006.description: This new variety of tomato is not to be missed.

Item_Drugs_001.name: Beast paw
Item_Drugs_001.description: An enemy's paw with long claws for that extra crunch.

Item_Drugs_003.name: Lizard tail
Item_Drugs_003.description: Hardly anyone gets why this is a delicacy, but it is!

Item_Drugs_004.name: Cyberheart
Item_Drugs_004.description: It is said to taste better if you make it sweet-and-sour.

Item_Drugs_005.name: Small blueberry jar
Item_Drugs_005.description: You can swallow everything inside with one gulp.

Item_Drugs_006.name: Electrocone
Item_Drugs_006.description: Make sure you wear rubber gloves when eating it.

Item_Drugs_007.name: Caviar
Item_Drugs_007.description: Used to be a rare delicacy, until the mass production process was developed...

Item_Drugs_008.name: Crimson petal
Item_Drugs_008.description: The alluring color says much about this unusual ingredient.

Item_Drugs_009.name: Mag-eye
Item_Drugs_009.description: Everything's worth it when it bursts in your mouth.

Item_Drugs_010.name: Dried meat
Item_Drugs_010.description: The unidentified meat was crudely processed and smelled strange. Hyena hooligans often carried it with them and "eat" it!

Item_Drugs_011_1.name: Fire gel
Item_Drugs_011_1.description: Just a slight dab will do. Too much will set your mouth on fire.

Item_Drugs_011_2.name: Ice gel
Item_Drugs_011_2.description: With just enough water elemental power to make it an edible jelly.

Item_Drugs_011_3.name: Lightning gel
Item_Drugs_011_3.description: Contains statics. Supposedly tingles and numbs the tongue.

Item_Drugs_012_1.name: Fire crystal
Item_Drugs_012_1.description: Crystal formed from the flame element. Supposedly can be used for seasoning when cooking.

Item_Drugs_012_2.name: Ice crystal
Item_Drugs_012_2.description: Often mistaken for simple ice cubes, a mistake intense to the gullet when devoured.

Item_Drugs_012_3.name: Lightning crystal
Item_Drugs_012_3.description: Watch out, it will numb your tongue completely!

Item_Vera_Harvest_001.name: Chilis
Item_Vera_Harvest_001.description: The real champion must take a bite! Oh spicy!!!

Item_Vera_Harvest_003.name: Aloe
Item_Vera_Harvest_003.description: The fertile herb is said to have beauty benefits.

Item_Vera_Harvest_004.name: Rose Petal
Item_Vera_Harvest_004.description: Shall I collect it for cooking or bathing...

Item_Vera_Harvest_006.name: Beetroot
Item_Vera_Harvest_006.description: Brought us the natural coloring. Thank you, beetroot.

Item_Vera_Harvest_008.name: Thornfruit
Item_Vera_Harvest_008.description: A small and crimson fruit that is only found in the Confounding Abyss. It's been found that the fruit is indeed edible and doesn't actually taste too bad.

Item_Vera_Harvest_009.name: Pumpkin
Item_Vera_Harvest_009.description: Perhaps... It would make a great decoration?

Item_Vera_Harvest_010.name: Soy
Item_Vera_Harvest_010.description: Plain little beans, but they can make a lot of good food.

Item_Vera_Harvest_011.name: White Jade Radish
Item_Vera_Harvest_011.description: The crisp and juicy white radish is delicious in any way.

Item_Vera_Harvest_012.name: Corn
Item_Vera_Harvest_012.description: Who doesn't love a sweet, soft and mellow corn?

Item_Vera_Harvest_015.name: Rib
Item_Vera_Harvest_015.description: Premium animal ribs, I've got a lot of ideas about how to cook them...

Item_Vera_Harvest_016.name: Antelope Antlers
Item_Vera_Harvest_016.description: It may have antelope in its name, but it looks like ordinary deer antlers!
Item_Vera_Harvest_016.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_017.name: Behemoth Bones
Item_Vera_Harvest_017.description: Besides snapping off those blue crystals as decorations, this bulky head is completely useless.
Item_Vera_Harvest_017.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_018.name: Solid Bone Fragment
Item_Vera_Harvest_018.description: Some tooth fragments, and maybe some cavities if you're unlucky.
Item_Vera_Harvest_018.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_019.name: Gale Claw
Item_Vera_Harvest_019.description: Solid bone structure with no risk of fractures.
Item_Vera_Harvest_019.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_020.name: Grayspace Spine
Item_Vera_Harvest_020.description: A chill runs down your spine from catching sight of it.
Item_Vera_Harvest_020.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_021.name: Marrow Concentrate
Item_Vera_Harvest_021.description: It's absolutely disgusting to get submerged in.
Item_Vera_Harvest_021.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_022.name: Crystamax Core
Item_Vera_Harvest_022.description: It's said to be the source of energy for Grayspace Entities, and its significance is extraordinary.
Item_Vera_Harvest_022.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_023.name: Crystamax Shard
Item_Vera_Harvest_023.description: Not a very pure or large Crystamax, but it's better than nothing.
Item_Vera_Harvest_023.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_024.name: Gray Matter Crystal
Item_Vera_Harvest_024.description: A crystal formed from gray matter.
Item_Vera_Harvest_024.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_025.name: Gray Matter Chunks
Item_Vera_Harvest_025.description: Some gray matter peeled off the bodies of Grayspace Entities.
Item_Vera_Harvest_025.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_026.name: Marzoid Ore
Item_Vera_Harvest_026.description: An ore with a really cool name.
Item_Vera_Harvest_026.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_027.name: Marzoid Debris
Item_Vera_Harvest_027.description: The debris of an ore with a really cool name.
Item_Vera_Harvest_027.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_028.name: Thornfruit Juice
Item_Vera_Harvest_028.description: Fruit juice with a beautiful hue. It looks just as delicious.
Item_Vera_Harvest_028.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_029.name: Lost Data Module
Item_Vera_Harvest_029.description: It's obviously not something an ordinary person can crack.
Item_Vera_Harvest_029.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_030.name: Machinery Core
Item_Vera_Harvest_030.description: Ah! What kind of cutting-edge technology created this?!
Item_Vera_Harvest_030.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_031.name: Lost Text
Item_Vera_Harvest_031.description: Precious text. Please cherish it as you would your own graduation thesis.
Item_Vera_Harvest_031.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_032.name: Tactical structure
Item_Vera_Harvest_032.description: The complex design makes the impossible possible.
Item_Vera_Harvest_032.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_033.name: Coating base
Item_Vera_Harvest_033.description: Internal configuration... What configuration! Look at the paint first!
Item_Vera_Harvest_033.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_034.name: Broken part
Item_Vera_Harvest_034.description: No matter how great a structure is, it cannot miss a single screw.
Item_Vera_Harvest_034.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain rewards

Item_Vera_Harvest_032_show.name: Fortress exoskeleton material
Item_Vera_Harvest_032_show.description: Chance of obtaining the following materials: tactical structures, coating bases, and broken parts.
Item_Vera_Harvest_032_show.source: Can be used in Appointed Research. Submit to Cowell in Vera Tower of Fantasy, Furnace Core Site to obtain fortress exoskeleton shards.

Item_Vera_GameToken.name: Arcade coupon
Item_Vera_GameToken.description: These coupons obtained from the arcade games in the Mirroria Casino can be redeemed for amazing gifts.
Item_Vera_GameToken.source: Redeem them for rewards at the Arcade counter.

Item_Vera_RaceToken.name: Race point
Item_Vera_RaceToken.description: Obtained by participating in group races.
Item_Vera_RaceToken.source: Used to unlock some race cars

Item_Vera_Chip.name: Copper bloom
Item_Vera_Chip.description: A special token only usable within the Joy Square. Exchange mira for it at the entrance, but there's a limit when exchanging it back to mira, so don't get too much at once.
Item_Vera_Chip.source: A token used in the Joy Square.

Item_8v8_coin.name: Critical Point
Item_8v8_coin.description: A specially prepared reward for those who muster up the courage to stare into the Abyss.
Item_8v8_coin.source: Play The Critical Abyss to get it and exchange it for rewards in the Points Store.

Blindbox_coin_03.name: Spring Stamp
Blindbox_coin_03.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.
Blindbox_coin_03.source: Buy Mystery Boxes to get the spring stamp. The stamp can be used to exchange goods at the Spring Market.

Blindbox_coin_04.name: Proof of Light
Blindbox_coin_04.description: Commemorative coupons for the Liuguang Motorshow. Hope you can find the most desirable treasures there.
Blindbox_coin_04.source: Gifted each time you open the Wheel of Light giftbox. Can be used to redeem items at the Expo Store.

Blindbox_coin_05.name: Exhibition Coupon
Blindbox_coin_05.description: A free coupon given to visitors of the Liuguang Motorshow. All experience is worthy of being remembered.
Blindbox_coin_05.source: A voucher that can be used to exchange for the Meteoric line of vehicles. Collect a certain number of them to exchange for Meteoric vehicles.

Item_Condiment_01.name: Carbonated water
Item_Condiment_01.description: Pretty bland but gives off a tingling sensation. Probably better when blended with something else.

Item_Condiment_02.name: Soy
Item_Condiment_02.description: One of the popular emergency provisions and the main ingredient for various products. Take it straight and you might get the runs.

Item_Condiment_03.name: Salad dressing
Item_Condiment_03.description: The perfect complement for salads. Few things are better than a perfect salad with the perfect dressing.

Item_Condiment_04.name: Wasabi
Item_Condiment_04.description: A condiment appreciated by those who seem to prefer choking while eating their food... Gak!

Item_Condiment_05.name: Onion
Item_Condiment_05.description: Nutritious and full of flavor, teary eyes are the price for preparation, though.

Item_Condiment_06.name: Rice
Item_Condiment_06.description: Has a unique aroma after it's cooked. One of the most versatile ingredients in the world.

Item_Condiment_07.name: Milk
Item_Condiment_07.description: A nutrient product of maternal love.

Item_Mushroom_003.name: Raincap
Item_Mushroom_003.description: Sprouts towards the sun only after raining. Supposedly tastes like sunshine.

Item_Mushroom_0031.name: Umbrella mushroom
Item_Mushroom_0031.description: Has a very distinct taste and is incredibly delicious.

Item_Mushroom_0041.name: Treecap
Item_Mushroom_0041.description: Fungi growing on trees. So-so in taste.

Item_Mushroom_0042.name: Woodear fungus
Item_Mushroom_0042.description: What? You never had it before? You're missing out, my friend!

Item_Fishes0051.name: Common taimen
Item_Fishes0051.description: Omnivorous fish with a very long maturity cycle, can grow up to 2 meters.

Item_Milk_003.name: Quality milk
Item_Milk_003.description: A common beverage, ready to drink and may be stored for a while. A nutritious fave.

Item_Fruit_0021.name: Mock strawberry
Item_Fruit_0021.description: A dead ringer for strawberry with a similar flavor.

Item_Meat_006.name: Prime cut
Item_Meat_006.description: The more the beast moved, the better the meat.

Item_Staples_0031.name: Snowy potato
Item_Staples_0031.description: Tastes great when baked, but eating too much of it won't make you pleasant around other people.

Item_Nuts0031.name: Spire nuts
Item_Nuts0031.description: A special variant of pinecone. Very rare, so get it when you have a chance!

Item_Follows0011.name: Cauliflower
Item_Follows0011.description: Whoa! What a big ole white cabbage!

Item_Greens_0031.name: Broccoflower
Item_Greens_0031.description: Nutritious, and every kid loves it.

Item_Gold.name: Gold
Item_Gold.description: This coin, minted from tin and gold, is currently the most popular currency across the land.

Item_MedalofValor_1.name: Warrior badge I
Item_MedalofValor_1.description: An exquisite badge symbolizing valor, skill, and honor, all of which are not bought, but earned.
Item_MedalofValor_1.source: Obtained from Apophis boss chests, Heirs of Aida enemy drops, and password boxes. For redeeming rewards in the Warrior Store.

Item_MedalofValor_2.name: Warrior badge II
Item_MedalofValor_2.description: An exquisite badge symbolizing valor, skill, and honor, all of which are not bought, but earned.
Item_MedalofValor_2.source: Obtained from Frost Bot boss chests, Ravager enemy drops, and password chests. For redeeming rewards in the Warrior Store.

Blindbox_coin_01.name: Spring Stamp
Blindbox_coin_01.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.
Blindbox_coin_01.source: Buy Mystery Boxes to get the spring stamp. The stamp can be used to exchange goods at the Spring Market.

Blindbox_coin_02.name: Proof of Light
Blindbox_coin_02.description: Commemorative coupons for the Liuguang Motorshow. Hope you can find the most desirable treasures there.
Blindbox_coin_02.source: Gifted each time you open the Wheel of Light giftbox. Can be used to redeem items at the Expo Store.

mount_006_coin.name: Exhibition Coupon
mount_006_coin.description: A free coupon given to visitors of the Liuguang Motorshow. All experience is worthy of being remembered.
mount_006_coin.source: A voucher that can be used to exchange for the Meteoric line of vehicles. Collect a certain number of them to exchange for Meteoric vehicles.

Item_Reputation1.name: Bounty EXP
Item_Reputation1.description: Made out of special metal and represents the contributions from the wanders of Aida to this planet. Worth endeavoring for.
Item_Reputation1.source: Gain Bounty EXP to level up and receive more rewarding Bounty Missions.

Item_Reputation2.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation2.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation2.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions at Banges Port and to purchase special items from vendors.

Item_Reputation3.name: Navia bounty coin
Item_Reputation3.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of a mechanical windmill. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation3.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions in the Navia region and to purchase special items from vendors.

Item_Reputation4.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation4.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation4.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions at Banges Port and to purchase special items from vendors.

Item_Reputation5.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation5.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation5.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions at Banges Port and to purchase special items from vendors.

item_GuildMeritorious.name: Merit
item_GuildMeritorious.description: Obtained from Crew events to redeem items in the Crew Store.

Item_Guildcapital.name: Crew fund
Item_Guildcapital.description: Obtained through daily Crew activities and donations.

Item_Experience.name: EXP
Item_Experience.description: A mysterious yet powerful force for character growth.
Item_Experience.source: Essential for leveling up Wanderers, obtained through various means.

Item_Diamond.name: Tanium
Item_Diamond.description: Stable crystals, most commonly used for energy supply. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.
Item_Diamond.source: Redeemable for items in the Store.

Item_Artifact_updata.name: Omnium alloy
Item_Artifact_updata.description: The latest metal material made from multiple types of metals with Omnium with good hardness, quality, and ductility. Mostly used for refining high-tech weapons and machines.
Item_Artifact_updata.source: For advancing Relics of all levels.

Item_FakeDiamond.name: Dark crystal
Item_FakeDiamond.description: Contains unstable energy and is sometimes used as a power source. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.
Item_FakeDiamond.source: Redeemable for items in the Store.

item_guild_1.name: Merit
item_guild_1.description: Obtained from Crew events to redeem items in the Crew Store.

item_guild_2.name: Crew fund
item_guild_2.description: Obtained through daily Crew activities and donations.

item_guild_3.name: Crew honor
item_guild_3.description: Obtained through Crew missions for rewards on the Crew page.

item_ticket_01.name: Proof of purchase
item_ticket_01.description: From Banges Tech. Home Matrix chip delivery available.
item_ticket_01.source: Apply to order Choice Matrices (not usable with Limited Order).

item_Cafe_1.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_1.description: Meat, veggies, and fruit. When mixed properly, they can orchestrate a delicacy as well.

item_Cafe_2.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_2.description: Some prefer to cut it into slices and eat it raw. However, it also tastes good when simply cooked.

item_Cafe_3.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_3.description: Fresh turkey stewed with the right ingredients for a total of forty-nine days...

item_Cafe_4.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_4.description: A perfect combo of pastry and fruit. Children's favorite.

item_Cafe_5.name: Mysterious recipe
item_Cafe_5.description: A drink made from common fruits.

item_Cafe_100.name: Mysterious ingredient
item_Cafe_100.description: One has to figure out how to cook it themself through research.

StrengthenStone_01.name: Booster module
StrengthenStone_01.description: Common machine parts for different specifications.

StrengthenStone_02.name: Advancement Module
StrengthenStone_02.description: With aim assist and weapon adjustment system for precision firing.

StrengthenStone_03.name: Booster Module II
StrengthenStone_03.description: Common machine parts for different specifications.

StrengthenStone_04.name: Advancement Module II
StrengthenStone_04.description: With aim assist and weapon adjustment system for precision firing.

EquipFragment.name: Base chip
EquipFragment.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.
EquipFragment.source: Redeemable for Matrix chips at the Matrix Store.

WeaponFragment.name: Black gold
WeaponFragment.description: Token forged by smiths from old Omnium weapons. Circulated only in special markets. Redeemable for weapons.
WeaponFragment.source: Redeemable for weapons at the Weapon Store.

Item_Mine001.name: Iron Ore
Item_Mine001.description: One of the most commonly seen metal ores that has a wide variety of usages.

Item_Mine002.name: Tungsten
Item_Mine002.description: A rare ore that can only be found in high altitude localities. Despite its plain appearance, the ore contains massive energy.

Item_Mine003.name: Titanium ore
Item_Mine003.description: A rare ore that only grows on high mountains. It's the ideal material in the view of blacksmiths.

Item_Mine004.name: Striped stone
Item_Mine004.description: A type of ore commonly seen near waterfalls that got its name for the stripes washed out by the current. Although it looks special, it is not good for forging.

Item_Plant001.name: Lilies
Item_Plant001.description: A common plant normally seen around St. Maurice. The flowers are white and pure, so they're often used in important ceremonies.

Item_Plant002.name: Azaleas
Item_Plant002.description: Common flowers that grow on plains and platforms. Judging from their bright color, maybe we can use them to dye hair?

Item_Plant003.name: Violets
Item_Plant003.description: Flowers with a luxury color that grow on high mountains and loved by women.

Item_Plant004.name: Passion fruits
Item_Plant004.description: Fruits grown near rivers and seas with elegant-colored flowers that are good for your lungs and throat.

Item_Mine_fire.name: Firecore
Item_Mine_fire.description: Shards with fire elemental power, give off a slight heat when melted down.

Item_Mine_fire_02.name: Heart of lava
Item_Mine_fire_02.description: Rare ore containing fire elemental power. The fiery redness is a sufficient proof of the power within.

Item_Mine_fire_03.name: Sunsource
Item_Mine_fire_03.description: Rare ore containing great fire elemental power. You can feel the swelling heat inside just holding it.

Item_Mine_ice.name: Icecore
Item_Mine_ice.description: Shards with ice elemental power, clear as a crystal.

Item_Mine_ice_02.name: Heart of winter
Item_Mine_ice_02.description: Rare ore with ice elemental power. The high purity ice element within gives it a rich blue appearance.

Item_Mine_ice_03.name: Snowsource
Item_Mine_ice_03.description: Rare ore containing great ice elemental power. A thin cold vapor always shrouds it, like an eternal layer of frost.

Item_Mine_thunder.name: Magcore
Item_Mine_thunder.description: Shards with volt elemental power that glow faintly in the dark.

Item_Mine_thunder_02.name: Heart of lightning
Item_Mine_thunder_02.description: Rare ore with volt elemental power. Flashes can be seen inside it in good lighting.

Item_Mine_thunder_03.name: Lightningsource
Item_Mine_thunder_03.description: Rare ore containing great volt elemental power, whose surface periodically emits electricity. So handle with care or you'll get zapped.

Item_Mine_physic.name: Rockcore
Item_Mine_physic.description: Extremely hard shards formed under Omnium's influence, with a drab appearance.

Item_Mine_physic_02.name: Heart of summit
Item_Mine_physic_02.description: Rare and extremely hard ore that requires special Omnium technology to forge.

Item_Mine_physic_03.name: Landsource
Item_Mine_physic_03.description: Whole and hard rare ore. The transparent crystal sometimes emits a tiny unknown pulse like a heartbeat.

Item_Mine_superpower.name: Activator Block
Item_Mine_superpower.description: The ore shard containing altered energy which pulses with an extremely weak life sign...

Item_Mine_superpower_02.name: Fission Crystal
Item_Mine_superpower_02.description: The rare ore containing altered energy which continues to divide and expand like cells.

Item_Mine_superpower_03.name: Proliferating Crystal Cluster
Item_Mine_superpower_03.description: A huge, rare ore rich in altered energy. It seems to be using its own consciousness to seek evolution and will continue to grow if left unchecked.

Item_breakthrough_A1.name: Nano Coating I
Item_breakthrough_A1.description: Coating developed from new technology that slightly improves weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_A2.name: Nano coating II
Item_breakthrough_A2.description: Redeveloped coating after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_A3.name: Nano coating III
Item_breakthrough_A3.description: Coating developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_B1.name: Acidproof Glaze I
Item_breakthrough_B1.description: Acidproof material developed from new technology to slightly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_B2.name: Acidproof glaze II
Item_breakthrough_B2.description: Redeveloped glaze after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_B3.name: Acidproof glaze III
Item_breakthrough_B3.description: Glaze developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_C1.name: Booster frame I
Item_breakthrough_C1.description: Fortified framework developed from new technology to slightly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_C2.name: Booster frame II
Item_breakthrough_C2.description: Redeveloped frame after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_C3.name: Booster frame III
Item_breakthrough_C3.description: Fortified framework developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_D1.name: Nanofiber frame I
Item_breakthrough_D1.description: Premium frame developed from new technology to slightly improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_D2.name: Nanofiber frame II
Item_breakthrough_D2.description: Redeveloped premium frame after more research to improve weapon performance.

Item_breakthrough_D3.name: Nanofiber frame III
Item_breakthrough_D3.description: Premium framework developed from exclusive Hykros technology to greatly improve weapon performance.

hardware_001.name: Triangular gear
hardware_001.description: The most essential parts to support the functioning of machines.

hardware_002.name: Alloy round studs
hardware_002.description: Enhanced parts for machines with less weight and increased hardness, and thus have a higher price.

hardware_003.name: Power Core
hardware_003.description: A very expensive high-tech component, safe and efficient because it blocks radiation while supplying massive Omnium energy.

GenePointItem_Attack.name: Originum (Attack)
GenePointItem_Attack.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.
GenePointItem_Attack.source: A necessity to activate enhanced Flairs. When a Relic is fully developed, Relics and shards with the same name can be dismantled into Originum.

GenePointItem_Assist.name: Originum (Support)
GenePointItem_Assist.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.
GenePointItem_Assist.source: A necessity to activate enhanced Flairs. When a Relic is fully developed, Relics and shards with the same name can be dismantled into Originum.

GenePointItem_Def.name: Originum (Feature)
GenePointItem_Def.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.
GenePointItem_Def.source: A necessity to activate enhanced Flairs. When a Relic is fully developed, Relics and shards with the same name can be dismantled into Originum.

Mount_Strengthen_1_1.name: E53 Coolant
Mount_Strengthen_1_1.description: A must for vehicle maintenance, also extends generator or engine life.

Mount_Strengthen_1_2.name: FF79 Alloy Lubricant
Mount_Strengthen_1_2.description: Composite lubricant that lasts longer than ordinary lubricants and is environmentally friendly.

Mount_Strengthen_1_3.name: Power Gears
Mount_Strengthen_1_3.description: Very durable alloy gears able to withstand constant operation. A must for vehicle improvement.

Mount_Strengthen_1_4.name: Leveler
Mount_Strengthen_1_4.description: Necessary component to adjust the balance of a vehicle, maximizing its speed by improving stability.

Mount_Strengthen_2_1.name: Precision Instrument
Mount_Strengthen_2_1.description: Instrument to diagnose vehicle conditions, with greater coverage and precision after rounds of development.

Mount_Strengthen_2_2.name: Shock Absorber
Mount_Strengthen_2_2.description: The most popular anti-shock component currently on the market. The quality makes it a beginning retrofitter's choice.

Mount_Strengthen_2_3.name: Universal Bearing
Mount_Strengthen_2_3.description: A common component for reducing friction between rotating parts. As the most prevalent of its kind, it has different models for different spots.

Mount_Strengthen_2_4.name: Electronic Control Unit
Mount_Strengthen_2_4.description: With aim assist and vehicle adjustment system for precision firing.

Mount_Strengthen_3_1.name: Turbocharger
Mount_Strengthen_3_1.description: Advanced turbo system developed by Banges Tech to greatly improve engine performance, thus a popular component for racers.

Mount_Strengthen_3_2.name: High-Performance Transmission
Mount_Strengthen_3_2.description: Component attached to the engine. Most users are thrilled by the sudden acceleration it provides, but its true value lies in the reliable, efficient deceleration.

Mount_Strengthen_3_3.name: Gyroscope
Mount_Strengthen_3_3.description: A component interconnecting major parts, relying on flexible rotations to reduce friction, extend lifespan of parts, and cut down on noise.

Mount_Strengthen_3_4.name: High-Energy Battery
Mount_Strengthen_3_4.description: Advanced Omnium battery developed by Hykros. Safety and efficiency are the biggest selling points.

Mount_Strengthen_4_1.name: Power Core
Mount_Strengthen_4_1.description: A very expensive high-tech component, safe and efficient because it blocks radiation while supplying massive Omnium energy.

Mount_Strengthen_4_2.name: Titanium Housing
Mount_Strengthen_4_2.description: Metal shell for engines. Highly-durable, lightweight, corrosion-resistant, and especially popular in regions with adverse environments.

Mount_Strengthen_4_3.name: Special Hamlin Bearing
Mount_Strengthen_4_3.description: Created by the Crown Mines scientist Hamlin to greatly improve a vehicle's energy efficiency, thus enhancing its performance.

Mount_Strengthen_4_4.name: Type V Engine
Mount_Strengthen_4_4.description: Advanced engine developed by Banges' famous vehicle researcher, Dr. V, who personally oversees the production of every unit, hence its rarity.

gift_Mount_006_skin.name: Windfall Meteor Box
gift_Mount_006_skin.description: Picked it up by chance. Which one of the shining meteors will be inside the palm of your hand?
gift_Mount_006_skin.source:
Open to receive one of the Meteoric line of vehicles. If you obtain a duplicate vehicle, it can be exchanged for 20 exhibition coupons.
Chance to obtain the following vehicles:
Justice Meteor, Nightfeather Meteor, Med Meteor, Rockin' Meteor, Pouncing Cat Meteor, Arena Meteor, Absconder Meteor, Smoothie Meteor, Wishing Meteor, Modular Meteor, Supercomputing Meteor, Frosty Meteor, Snow Rose Meteor, EM Meteor, Glowing Meteor, Windrunner Meteor, Freedom Meteor, Electrovision Meteor, Neon Meteor, Surveyor Meteor, Scuba Meteor, Steady Meteor, Flame Chaser Meteor, Roaming Meteor, Phantasmic Meteor, Inspirational Meteor, DIY Meteor.

choose_Mount_006_skin.name: Meteor Box Reserve
choose_Mount_006_skin.description: In the dazzling rain of stars, there must be one of your destiny.
choose_Mount_006_skin.source:
Open and choose one from the following vehicles:
Justice Meteor, Nightfeather Meteor, Med Meteor, Rockin' Meteor, Pouncing Cat Meteor, Arena Meteor, Absconder Meteor, Smoothie Meteor, Wishing Meteor, Modular Meteor, Supercomputing Meteor, Frosty Meteor, Snow Rose Meteor, EM Meteor, Glowing Meteor, Windrunner Meteor, Freedom Meteor, Electrovision Meteor, Neon Meteor, Surveyor Meteor, Scuba Meteor, Steady Meteor, Flame Chaser Meteor, Roaming Meteor, Phantasmic Meteor, Inspirational Meteor, DIY Meteor.

Justice Meteor, Nightfeather Meteor, Med Meteor, Rockin' Meteor, Pouncing Cat Meteor, Arena Meteor, Absconder Meteor, Smoothie Meteor, Wishing Meteor, Modular Meteor, Supercomputing Meteor, Frosty Meteor, Snow Rose Meteor, EM Meteor, Glowing Meteor, Windrunner Meteor, Freedom Meteor, Electrovision Meteor, Neon Meteor, Surveyor Meteor, Scuba Meteor, Steady Meteor, Flame Chaser Meteor, Roaming Meteor, Phantasmic Meteor, Inspirational Meteor, DIY Meteor.

Item_EquipAttrSelect.description: This tiny instrument can detect low-level issues during equipment advancement, ensuring it won't grow into what you won't desire.
Item_EquipAttrSelect.source: Preserve one random stat which won't be upgraded during equipment advancement. Costs one per advancement.

Item_Vera_Hotel20.description: Be careful or you'll hit your head on the ceiling!
Item_Vera_Hotel20.source: Use in the Backpack after purchasing. This decoration can be added to the Mirafleur Hall guest room.

Item_Vera_Hotel21.name: Otter Stress Ball
Item_Vera_Hotel21.description: A fun toy to throw around... But its appearance is somewhat familiar.
Item_Vera_Hotel21.source: Use in the Backpack after purchasing. This decoration can be added to the Mirafleur Hall guest room.

Item_Vera_Hotel22.name: Dolly
Item_Vera_Hotel22.description: A hug can heal your heart and soul.
Item_Vera_Hotel22.source: Use in the Backpack after purchasing. This decoration can be added to the Mirafleur Hall guest room.

item_activity_time_worldboss_01.name: Frontier Command
item_activity_time_worldboss_01.description: Archon Elric has issued a top command, requesting all appointed Executors to immediately go support the border transit station.
item_activity_time_worldboss_01.source: Allows another attempt on the Mirror Space - Frontier Clash challenge

item_activity_time_voidclone_01.name: Rift Generator
item_activity_time_voidclone_01.description: A device developed to enable more frequent visits to the Void Rift for investigation, capable of generating a spatial pathway to the Void Rift.
item_activity_time_voidclone_01.source: Allows another attempt on the Mirror Space - Void Rift challenge

Item_WormholeEnergy.name: Void energy
Item_WormholeEnergy.description: The highly efficient energy source collected from the Void. Executors can use it to activate hidden functions when exploring the void, greatly enhancing combat capability.
Item_WormholeEnergy.source: Usable in the Void Abyss. Consume void energy to load Abyssal Tech and gain stat bonuses in the Void Abyss. All void energy obtained in the previous month will be cleared on the first day of every month.

LevyClone_time.name: Spatial Reorganizer
LevyClone_time.description: Specific devices that can reassemble known spatial fragments. Use it to freely select fragments to connect together.
LevyClone_time.source: Grants another reward chance for Raids

item_activity_time_LevyClone_01.name: Space Orientator I
item_activity_time_LevyClone_01.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures a specific segment, which will be directionally connected to the "Midlevel Control Room" after use.
item_activity_time_LevyClone_01.source: Allows another attempt on the Mirror Space - Midlevel Control Room challenge

item_activity_time_LevyClone_02.name: Space Orientator II
item_activity_time_LevyClone_02.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures a specific segment, which will be directionally connected to the "Phantasmic Zenith" after use.
item_activity_time_LevyClone_02.source: Allows another attempt on the Mirror Space - Phantasmic Zenith challenge

item_activity_time_LevyClone_03.name: Space Orientator III
item_activity_time_LevyClone_03.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures a specific segment, which will be directionally connected to the "Shattered Realm" after use.
item_activity_time_LevyClone_03.source: Allows another attempt on the Mirror Space - Shattered Realm challenge

item_activity_time_LevyClone_04.name: Space Orientator IV
item_activity_time_LevyClone_04.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures specific fragments, which will be directionally connected to the Battle Test Area after use.
item_activity_time_LevyClone_04.source: Allows another attempt on the Battle Test Area challenge

item_transfercard.name: District Orders
item_transfercard.description: A zoning order was secretly issued by Hykros. It can be used to change the server the character is on.
item_transfercard.source: Server transfer free of charge one time.

Item_Homeland_map.name: Artificial Island Survey Drawing
Item_Homeland_map.description: The shape, size, properties, etc., of the Artificial Island are measured, collected, and drawn into a map to facilitate the planning, design, and construction of many buildings on the island.

Blindbox_SpringFestival_2022.name: Apricity Giftbox
Blindbox_SpringFestival_2022.description: Limited-Time giftbox offered to celebrate the arrival of spring. It's always a mixture of anticipation and trepidation when you open the box.
Blindbox_SpringFestival_2022.source: Random box. Low chance of getting: [Outfit] Fruity Candy, \[Outfit] Era, \[Outfit] Forget Me Not, \[Accessory] Layer Cake, \[Accessory] Curtain, \[Accessory] Black Goat Horns, \[Avatar] May All Go Well, \[Avatar Frame] Peace and Joy, \[Chat Bubble] End of the Year.

gift_BigClient_01.name: Wanderer's Welcome Pack
gift_BigClient_01.description: Hope these gifts will send the otter's regards and appreciation to the trailblazer.
gift_BigClient_01.source: Tata's welcome gift for the trailblazer. Contains: gold nucleus ×5, proof of purchase ×5, cluster ×500, gold ×50,000.

gift_BigClient_birthday.name: Wanderer's Birthday Present
gift_BigClient_birthday.description: The otter has prepared a birthday gift for the Trailblazer and looked forward to the day— Happy Birthday!
gift_BigClient_birthday.source: Tata's birthday present for the trailblazer. Contains: red nucleus ×6, special voucher ×6, gold nucleus ×6, proof of purchase ×6, cluster ×666, gold ×50,000.

gift_activity2_Love.name: Cetus Letter
gift_activity2_Love.description: "Packed! Pink! Packed! Blue! Hey! What's the next one!? Hanna! I need some help over here!!!" Melo seems to be having a minor issue with packaging, as whatever color letter paper that comes out of it is not a surprise at all.
gift_activity2_Love.source: Open to obtain a random Letter. Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expires on March 4, 2022.

gift_matrix_SR3.name: Frost Bot Matrix Gift
gift_matrix_SR3.source: Contains a random Frost Bot Matrix.

gift_ticket_01_10_autouse.description: A box with proof of purchase ×10.
gift_ticket_01_10_autouse.source: Get proof of purchase ×10 that can be used for Special Orders of Matrix.

gift_elemine_p1.name: Elemental Ore Shard Box
gift_elemine_p1.source: Get a random elemental ore shard.

gift_elemine_p1_all.name: Elemental Ore Shard Box
gift_elemine_p1_all.description: Contains all kinds of elemental ore shards.
gift_elemine_p1_all.source: Open to get firecore, icecore, rockcore, and magcore.

gift_Mount_01.name: Vehicle maintenance box
gift_Mount_01.description: Get random amount of vehicle maintenance materials.
gift_Mount_01.source: Contains random materials for vehicle maintenance.

gift_artifact_rare.name: Type II Relic box
gift_artifact_rare.description: A box containing a random Relic. A small chance of getting an SSR Relic.

gift_pursue_dream.name: Pro weapon box
gift_pursue_dream.description: Cache specifically for storing elite weapons. A few were lost and forgotten in the wastelands.
gift_pursue_dream.source: A random box that upon opening, rewards one of the following weapons: <orange>Thunderblades</>, <orange>Rosy Edge</>, <orange>Icewind Arrow</>, <orange>Absolute Zero</>, <orange>Scythe of the Crow</>, <orange>Chakram of the Seas</>, <orange>Negating Cube</>, <orange>Dual EM Stars</>, <orange>Molten Shield V2</>, <purple>Staff of Scars</>,<purple>The Terminator</>, <purple>Pummeler</>, <purple>Nightingale's Feather</>, <purple>Thunderous Halberd</>.

gift_dailyAward_food.name: Random ingredient pack
gift_dailyAward_food.description: A pack containing random food ingredients.
gift_dailyAward_food.source: Get a certain amount of ingredients for cooking.

gift_dailyAward_cooking.name: Random entrée pack
gift_dailyAward_cooking.description: A pack containing a random entrée.
gift_dailyAward_cooking.source: Get a random entrée that provides a buff after consumption.

gift_sr.name: Random SR Relic box
gift_sr.description: A random box. Open the box and get a random Relic in it. Possible Rewards: Hovering Cannon, Jetpack, Lava Bomb, Jetboard, Magnetic Storm, Quantum Cloak, Missile Barrage, Couant, Strange Cube, Omnium Handcannon, Magnetic Pulse, or Cybernetic Arm.

gift_ssr.name: Random SSR Relic box
gift_ssr.description: A random box. Open the box and get a random Relic in it. Possible Rewards: Colossus Arm, Omnium Shield, Type V Armor, Spacetime Rift, Confinement, Drone, Hologram Projector, or Alternate Destiny.

gift_frag_sr.name: SR Relic shard box
gift_frag_sr.source: Open the box and get a random <Purple>SR</> Relic shard in it. Possible rewards: Hovercannon shard, Jetpack shard, Lava Bomb shard, Jetboard shard, Magnetic Storm shard, Quantum Cloak shard, Missile Barrage shard, Couant shard, Strange Cube shard, Omnium Handcannon shard, Magnetic Pulse shard, or Cybernetic Arm shard.

gift_frag_ssr.name: SSR Relic shard box
gift_frag_ssr.source: Open the box and get a random <Orange>SSR</> Relic shard in it. Possible rewards: Colossus Arm shard, Omnium Shield shard, Type V Armor shard, Spacetime Rift shard, Confinement shard, or Drone shard.

gift_frag_sr_autouse.name: SR Relic shard box
gift_frag_sr_autouse.source: Open the box and get a random <Purple>SR</> Relic shard in it. Possible rewards: Hovercannon shard, Jetpack shard, Lava Bomb shard, Jetboard shard, Magnetic Storm shard, Quantum Cloak shard, Missile Barrage shard, Couant shard, Strange Cube shard, Omnium Handcannon shard, Magnetic Pulse shard, or Cybernetic Arm shard.

gift_frag_sr_firstweek.name: SR Relic shard box

Possible rewards: Hovercannon shard, Jetpack shard, Lava Bomb shard, Jetboard shard, Magnetic Storm shard, Quantum Cloak shard, Missile Barrage shard, Couant shard, Strange Cube shard, Omnium Handcannon shard, or Magnetic Pulse shard.

gift_monthcard_autouse.name: Random monthly pass box
gift_monthcard_autouse.description: Guaranteed weapon augmentation box II ×1, cluster ×10, and receive one of the following items at random: gold nucleus, proof of purchase, random SSR Relic shard box, random SR Relic shard box, weapon battery II, weapon battery III, weapon battery IV, matrix data pack II, matrix data pack III, and matrix data pack IV.

gift_matrix_sr.name: SR Matrix box
gift_matrix_sr.source: Open the box and get a random <Purple>SR</> Matrix in it. Possible rewards: Robarg: Matrix, Apophis: Matrix, Frost Bot: Matrix, Sobek: Matrix, Barbarossa: Matrix, Pepper: Matrix, Hilda: Matrix, Ene: Matrix, Bai Ling: Matrix, or Echo: Matrix.

gift_matrix_ssr.name: SSR Matrix box
gift_matrix_ssr.source: Open the box and get a random <Orange>SSR</> Matrix in it. Possible Rewards: Meryl: Matrix, Tsubasa: Matrix, Cocoritter: Matrix, KING: Matrix, Shiro: Matrix, Zero: Matrix, Samir: Matrix, Huma: Matrix, or Crow: Matrix.
