item_activity2_mould_2.description: Delicate circular mold, essential for making the perfect chocolate.
item_activity2_mould_2.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity2_mould_3.name: Rectangular Mold
item_activity2_mould_3.description: Delicate rectangular mold, essential for making the perfect chocolate.
item_activity2_mould_3.source: Use it for the Sweets Workshop event, which expirs on March 4, 2022.

item_activity3_mould_1.name: Classic mooncake mold
item_activity3_mould_1.description: A mold for creating classic mooncakes. Don't eat the mold, no matter how hungry you are! Has a chance to drop from Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, from participating in the Mirroria Race, playing the Fight the Landlord at Joy Square or the arcade machines in the Casino, or purchasing goods from the terminals of Frontier Logistics.
item_activity3_mould_1.source: Required material for making mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event.

item_activity3_mould_2.name: Crispy mooncake mold
item_activity3_mould_2.description: A mold for creating crispy mooncakes. Don't eat the mold, no matter how hungry you are! Has a chance to drop from Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, from participating in the Mirroria race, playing Fight the Landlord at Joy Square or the arcade machines in the Casino, or purchasing goods from the terminals of Frontier Logistics.
item_activity3_mould_2.source: Required material for making mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event.

item_activity3_mould_3.name: Snowy mooncake mold
item_activity3_mould_3.description: A mold for creating snowy mooncakes. Don't eat the mold, no matter how hungry you are! Has a chance to drop from Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, from participating in the Mirroria race, playing Fight the Landlord at Joy Square or the arcade machines in the Casino, or purchasing goods from the terminals of Frontier Logistics.
item_activity3_mould_3.source: Required material for making mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_1.name: Composite Energy
Item_PrimaryEnergy_1.description: Primary products of the energy collector, construction material in the Artificial Island region

Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.description: Miniature energy crystals which are generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.source: Can be exchanged for goods at the Crystal Dust Store.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.description: Miniature energy crystals which are generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.source: Can be exchanged for goods in the Crystal Dust Store after reaching Level 40.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.description: Miniature energy crystals which are generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.source: Can be exchanged for goods in the Crystal Dust Store after reaching Level 50.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.name: Spacetime Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.description: Crystal dust that escaped from the trajectory of spacetime. Seems to be able to affect the stability of spacetime fragments.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Spacetime Store

Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.name: Spacetime Crystal Fragments
Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.description: These fragments floating in the trajectory of spacetime operations are the products of shattered spacetime.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Spacetime Store

Item_LifeCrystal.name: Life Crystal
Item_LifeCrystal.description: Dropped by creatures on the Artificial Island

Item_report_xsj_001.name: Research Report
Item_report_xsj_001.description: Dr. Henry of Hykros seems to know something about the lost research report.
Item_report_xsj_001.source: Dr. Henry of Hykros seems to know something about the lost research report.

Item_Area2BulidMaterials.name: Purification Filter
Item_Area2BulidMaterials.description: A device required for filtering water to meet drinking water standards.

Item_q103005_1.name: Disposable Omnium Battery
Item_q103005_1.description: A battery weapon given to you by Melo. It seems to be suitable for one use only. Used for repelling incoming Ravagers.

Rename.name: Identity update card
Rename.description: An identity update card secretly issued by Hykros. Can modify identity information after use.
Rename.source: Each card can only be used once.

Tower_xingyuan0.name: Depleted Astrum
Tower_xingyuan0.description: Depleted Astrum can be used to collect and store Astrum energy.

Title_1_2_9_1.name: Dr. Mega Brain
Title_1_2_9_1.description: Participate in the Crew Mega Brain Test and win first place.

Item_FixTool.name: Repair Tools
Item_FixTool.description: Precious tools used specifically to repair the wind turbine and maintain power generation.

Item_AssistContribution.name: Support points
Item_AssistContribution.description: Awarded to those who helped new Wanderers. Imprinted with an image for mutual support. Join Team Support System to get.
Item_AssistContribution.source: Can be exchanged for goods in the Support Store.

item_Regression_AssistContribution.name: Return Support Points
item_Regression_AssistContribution.description: Awarded to those who helped return Executors. Obtain by teaming up with returning Executors and participating in gameplay.
item_Regression_AssistContribution.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Store

Title_1_2_13_1.name: Flowing Melody
Title_1_2_13_1.description: Achieve 7,500 in note impact training proficiency.

Title_1_3_1_1.name: Commander
Title_1_3_1_1.description: Reach Commander rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_1_2.name: Star General
Title_1_3_1_2.description: Reach Star General rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_1_3.name: Battle Lord
Title_1_3_1_3.description: Reach Battle Lord rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_1_4.name: Grand Marshal
Title_1_3_1_4.description: Reach Grand Marshal rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_2_1.name: Gardener
Title_1_3_2_1.description: Kindergartens may not hold their own legends, but vegetable gardens do.

chat_qipao4.name: Together Time
chat_qipao4.description: What's most important is having fun with friends.

chat_qipao5.name: Holiday Fun
chat_qipao5.description: Why don't we spend the rare day off relaxing?

chat_qipao6.name: Crimson Clash
chat_qipao6.description: Speed up, crash, bombard, and explode.

chat_qipao7.name: Gifts Galore
chat_qipao7.description: Gifts left for you by a certain anonymous otter.

chat_qipao8.name: Elemental Aggregation
chat_qipao8.description: Man, the water core is running away again!

chat_qipao9.name: Frozen Past
chat_qipao9.description: Everything lies scattered and broken in the vast white snow.

chat_qipao10.name: Walking with Ene
chat_qipao10.description: Ene is a super fighting robot! That's what you want for a convoy!

chat_qipao11.name: Shelter of the Past
chat_qipao11.description: The breeze is a reminder of the past, yet a participant is missing.

chat_qipao12.name: Under the Thumb
chat_qipao12.description: You can run, but you can't hide from her.

chat_qipao13.name: Proud Blade
chat_qipao13.description: No mercy is the greatest respect she could give to foes begging under her blade.

chat_qipao14.name: Special permissions
chat_qipao14.description: "Freeze, scumbag! Give up now! Bang, bang!"

chat_qipao15.name: Path of the Seeker
chat_qipao15.description: The beautiful life of the past shall reemerge again.

chat_qipao16.name: Hanging amusement park
chat_qipao16.description: Cetus Island amusement park - have fun like never before!

chat_qipao18.name: Moon: Shining Shadow
chat_qipao18.description: May the moon's white light guide you through the dark.

chat_qipao20.name: Top Construction Team
chat_qipao20.description: Top Construction Team exclusive chat bubble

chat_qipao21.name: Dawn: First Light
chat_qipao21.description: The night is darkest before the dawn.

chat_qipao22.name: End of the Year
chat_qipao22.description: This warm lamp embodies thousands of wishes.

chat_qipao23.name: Love
chat_qipao23.description: Record your anxious feelings of love, bit by bit.

chat_qipao24.description: I won't deny my code name Nemesis, but my real name is, Shirli.

chat_qipao25.description: Why would you care about the form of the carrier? Getting the job done is the top priority here.

chat_qipao26.name: Past Days
chat_qipao26.description: Circumstances change with the passage of time, but some always remain the same.

chat_qipao27.name: Pawpaw Dreamscape
chat_qipao27.description: If sleep in the cozy Pawpaw House, a good dream is guaranteed.

chat_qipao28.name: Midnight Logic
chat_qipao28.description: At night, the peanuts are said to show some magical features—such as catching an otter that steals the food.

chat_qipao29.name: Pumpkin Party
chat_qipao29.description: Let's party all night long! And have a dream full of pumpkins.

chat_qipao30.name: Vanity of Life
chat_qipao30.description: Do robot Alf dream of electric dorayaki?

chat_qipao31.name: Set Off Again
chat_qipao31.description: Set sail once again and adventure with your partners in the unknown realm.

chat_qipao32.name: A Fighter's Notes
chat_qipao32.description: To improve my combat skills, I'm going to defeat a few more Steel Lizards!

chat_qipao33.name: Phantom in the Mirror
chat_qipao33.description: Whether it's fake or real, the phantom in the mirror was finally shattered.

chat_qipao34.name: Hide-and-Seek Winner
chat_qipao34.description: Not here? Not here either? I've gotta be the winner of this hide-and-seek game!

chat_qipao36.name: Affection Bubble
chat_qipao36.description: The things that I wanted to say are not just dream-talk.

chat_qipao37.name: Floating Paradise
chat_qipao37.description: There are lots of time to take a look around. Why not go to the fountain and make a wish first?

chat_qipao38.name: Dragon Boat Festival
chat_qipao38.description: Fragrance of mugwort, deep in thought.

chat_qipao39.name: Pure White Resonance
chat_qipao39.description: "The pure white core awakens. Now its power intertwines with ones with a heart of valor and justice! Resonate!"

chat_qipao40.name: The Doctor's Assistant
chat_qipao40.description: If only Hanna could do more for the doctor...

chat_qipao41.name: Summer Stream
chat_qipao41.description: Got your Jetboard ready? Let's ride the waves!

chat_qipao42.name: Summer Festival
chat_qipao42.description: Swimming in the pool happily, the fish must be celebrating the festival as well!

chat_qipao43.name: Crackling Sounds
chat_qipao43.description: The bustle of the bazaar comes from the crowds, music from the stalls, the grills, and the night-blooming...

chat_qipao44.name: Innocence
chat_qipao44.description: The characteristics are not completely gone but at least gone by half...

chat_qipao45.name: Fantasy Park
chat_qipao45.description: Exclusive to the Fantasy Park theme event in the Douliu Community.

chat_qipao46.name: Crimson Puzzle
chat_qipao46.description: Finally reaching sister's house after the ordeal, what awaits behind the door is... Sis and Mom?

chat_qipao47.name: Sweet Radiance
chat_qipao47.description: With a mouthful of the refreshing watermelon, even the wind feels a little cooler.

chat_qipao48.name: Refreshing Swim
chat_qipao48.description: Taking a shower after a swim feels clean and refreshing. All the fatigue seems to have been washed away as well.

chat_qipao49.name: Discipline Enforcement
chat_qipao49.description: Hey, you there, your skirt is too short! What? I don't care if you are the Class President!

chat_qipao50.name: Curious Cat
chat_qipao50.description: You can rest assured of her professional competence, but occasionally remind her to curb her overexuberant curiosity...

chat_qipao51.name: Full Moon
chat_qipao51.description: What a wonderful time! May we enjoy many years of Mid-Autumn moons.

chat_qipao52.name: Glimpse
chat_qipao52.description: If you go over the speed limit, Captain Saki Fuwa will teach you a lesson...

chat_qipao53.name: Clock Hand
chat_qipao53.description: The moonlight melody is playing. The minute-hand turns rapidly.

chat_qipao54.name: Golden Fruits
chat_qipao54.description: Autumn is a good time to enjoy the scenery and fruits.

chat_qipao55.name: Candy Feast
chat_qipao55.description: Eat more candies while your cavities aren't paying attention!

bag_chat_qipao48.name: Refreshing Swim Giftbox
bag_chat_qipao48.description: Taking a shower after a swim feels clean and refreshing. All the fatigue seems to have been washed away as well.
bag_chat_qipao48.source: Use to get the avatar Rare Holiday, avatar frame Attention of the Pool, and chat bubble Refreshing Swim.

bag_chat_qipao52.name: End-Track Giftbox
bag_chat_qipao52.description: Ride like the wind! Passion is forever young.
bag_chat_qipao52.source: Use to get the avatar End-Track, avatar frame Speed Chaser, and chat bubble Glimpse.

bag_chat_qipao53.name: Clock Hand Giftbox
bag_chat_qipao53.description: The moonlight melody is playing. The minute-hand turns rapidly.
bag_chat_qipao53.source: Use to receive the avatar frame Complex Pattern, and chat bubble Clock Hand.

Item_voucher.name: Tanium voucher
Item_voucher.description: High-value special currency issued by Hykros in its early days.
Item_voucher.source: Will automatically be used first when purchasing.

Title_1_2_14_1.name: Football Hero
Title_1_2_14_1.description: Achieve 7,500 in football skill training proficiency.

CombatAward_128.name: Advanced Pass
CombatAward_128.source: Activate an Advanced Pass when used.

FB08mushroom_q205008.name: Darkscale Ghost Spore
FB08mushroom_q205008.description: A rare fungus that grows in dark, humid places and tastes delicious. Make sure you cook it, or the consequences will be unimaginable...
FB08mushroom_q205008.source: Used for the Help Fufu mission.

Title_1_3_1_5.name: Private
Title_1_3_1_5.description: Reach Private rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_1_6.name: Elite
Title_1_3_1_6.description: Reach Elite rank in the Apex League.

Title_1_3_1_7.name: Sergeant
Title_1_3_1_7.description: Reach Sergeant rank in the Apex League.

MonthCard.name: Monthly pass
MonthCard.source: Activate the monthly pass and obtain 300 taniums. If you have already activated a monthly pass, it will be extended by 30 days.

Area4TimeCapsule.name: Mysterious Notebook
Area4TimeCapsule.description: An electronic notepad used for taking notes. Famous for its super standby mode.
Area4TimeCapsule.source: Used for the Gus's Discovery mission.

Area4Pretend.name: Miner's Clothes
Area4Pretend.description: Not the most subtle work clothes... Wear them in the Crown Mines and risk being attacked by the Hyenas.
Area4Pretend.source: Used for the Righteous Disguise mission.

Item_WorldPuzzle_1.name: Console Components
Item_WorldPuzzle_1.description: Components designed to repair the console.

Item_WorldPuzzle_StrangeMine1.name: Shiny Residue
Item_WorldPuzzle_StrangeMine1.description: Shiny fragments that exude some kind of strange aura.
Item_WorldPuzzle_StrangeMine1.source: Doesn't the debris found near the ore pile seem a little different from ordinary ore?

Item_WorldPuzzle_StrangeMine2.name: Ore Extract
Item_WorldPuzzle_StrangeMine2.source: Used to start the conversion device.

Item_ChargerBattery_SpecialAP.name: Charging Component
Item_ChargerBattery_SpecialAP.description: Used to replenish the energy of the Charging Tower.

Item_FireFly_Mist.name: Firefly
Item_FireFly_Mist.description: Glowing fireflies that seem to be of some use
Item_FireFly_Mist.source: Used to light up fog lamps on boats on the Artificial Island

Area4TimeCapsuleA.name: Luhn's Notebook
Area4TimeCapsuleA.description: An electronic notepad used for taking notes. Famous for its super standby mode.

Area4BranchMaterials.name: Transmission Bearing
Area4BranchMaterials.description: A basic transmission device used to reduce machinery wear.
Area4BranchMaterials.source: Used for the Amusement Park Maintenance mission.

Item_Guildconvene.name: Positioning Beacon
Item_Guildconvene.source: Can be used by Crewmates at deputy position and above.

Title_1_2_15_1.name: The Path of Balance
Title_1_2_15_1.description: Achieve 7,500 in gravity ball training proficiency.

AvatarFrame03.name: Shining Star
AvatarFrame03.description: Never envy anyone else's light—you are the most brilliant shining star!

AvatarFrame04.name: Leader of Astra
AvatarFrame04.description: He's the leader of Astra as well as a brother, just one of the countless ordinary folks wanting to protect their family.

AvatarFrame06.name: Pure Illusion
AvatarFrame06.description: "Don't you go anywhere, I'm not done playing yet!"

AvatarFrame07.name: Call of the Dead
AvatarFrame07.description: For your own safety, I don't think you should annoy the lady.

AvatarFrame08.name: Absolute Authority
AvatarFrame08.description: Her order is her will. There's no compromise in her missions.

AvatarFrame12.name: Tower's Core
AvatarFrame12.description: Hope or destruction? Different people hold different perspectives on it.

AvatarFrame13.name: Expert Creator
AvatarFrame13.description: Nobody can go back and redo the past, but you can create a new future from now on.

AvatarFrame14.name: SciFi World
AvatarFrame14.description: SciFi World December 2021 Issue Collaboration Exclusive Rewards.

AvatarFrame15.name: Assistant
AvatarFrame15.description: "Mi-a will send you back to Hykros with a drone if you are defeated."

AvatarFrame16.name: Hanging amusement park
AvatarFrame16.description: Cetus Island amusement park - have fun like never before!

AvatarFrame17.name: Champion Shopkeeper
AvatarFrame17.description: I don't want to be an Executor. I just wanna make dinner with you, Mi-a!

AvatarFrame18.name: Top Construction Team
AvatarFrame18.description: Every single drop of sweat and every single brick... I have to record every engineer's contribution to our construction efforts.

AvatarFrame19.name: Dawn: Morning Light
AvatarFrame19.description: The night is darkest before the dawn.

AvatarFrame20.name: Moon: Crossing Light
AvatarFrame20.description: May the moon's white light guide you through the dark.

AvatarFrame21.name: Peace and Joy
AvatarFrame21.description: The time has come to hang festive lanterns and welcome the coming spring.

AvatarFrame22.name: Tipsy
AvatarFrame22.description: Colorful dreams and intoxicating love, all in one piece of chocolate.

AvatarFrame23.name: Companion
AvatarFrame23.description: Part of the past has become a bubble in memory, but there are still things at hand that can be held tightly and never let go of.

AvatarFrame24.name: Outside Body
AvatarFrame24.description: Isn't it rather superficial to cast judgement on what life is or is not?

AvatarFrame26.name: Knight of Night
AvatarFrame26.description: A silent, vigilant guard, now protecting your machine pod.

AvatarFrame27.name: Pawpaw Treasure
AvatarFrame27.description: How many treasures did Smarty hide in the Pawpaw House? I'm curious.

AvatarFrame28.name: Pumpkin Night
AvatarFrame28.description: Pumpkins, pumpkins, pumpkins! I need more pumpkins!

AvatarFrame29.name: Memories
AvatarFrame29.description: Some things can remind us of our life before the Cataclysm.

AvatarFrame30.name: Gaze Mirroria
AvatarFrame30.description: Fantasies that span across the plane converge here.

AvatarFrame31.name: Steel Lizard Charge
AvatarFrame31.description: Lizards are also a type of dragon, so the Steel Lizard Charge is also a kind of dragon vehicle.

AvatarFrame32.name: Off-Balance Dancer
AvatarFrame32.description: Beneath the gorgeous skirt are crisis, mystery, and fear.

AvatarFrame34.name: Journey Nursery Rhyme
AvatarFrame34.description: Welcome back, Mi-a! Let's continue our journey.

AvatarFrame35.name: Cordate Jellybean
AvatarFrame35.description: Sweetness and love, all hidden in the small jellybeans.

AvatarFrame36.name: Naughty Trails
AvatarFrame36.description: Forget about all your anxieties and worries, and have a good time on Cetus Island!

AvatarFrame37.name: Aroma of Leaves
AvatarFrame37.description: Wrapped in jade and tied with rainbow, you chewy little pudding endearing like snow.

AvatarFrame38.name: Pure White Conversion
AvatarFrame38.description:
"Hey… do you think we can still win this one? The Violet Core is shattered. I guess we can't win this one. The enemy is too powerful."
"Regardless, we still have faith in the Violet Core and ourselves. We believe in the power of valor and justice."
"There's something strange about the Violet Core! Is that... a white light?!"

AvatarFrame39.name: Chief Park Ranger
AvatarFrame39.description: The maintenance of the park is complete! Dear customer, do you wanna join us for a ride?

AvatarFrame40.name: Salty Wave
AvatarFrame40.description: Beach, sand castle, aren't they the best matches for the salty soda?

AvatarFrame41.name: Summer Cool
AvatarFrame41.description: The fishtail swayed lightly, raising a trace of coolness in the heat.

AvatarFrame42.name: Sparkler Bouquet
AvatarFrame42.description: Compared with common bouquets, this exclusive festival decoration not only has sound effects and motion effects, but it also feels hot!

AvatarFrame43.name: Nurse Trainee
AvatarFrame43.description: They may not be experienced, but their sincere wish to help the Astra Shelter has made them shine.

AvatarFrame44.name: Fantasy Park
AvatarFrame44.description: Exclusive to the Fantasy Park theme event in the Douliu Community.

AvatarFrame45.name: Friend Astray
AvatarFrame45.description: Although she got lost on her way to her sister's cabin, she met two gentle but powerful knights and their elf companions.

AvatarFrame46.name: Watermelon Feast
AvatarFrame46.description: Should I slice it or cut it into chunks? Or maybe scoop it up with a spoon!?

AvatarFrame47.name: Attention of the Pool
AvatarFrame47.description: Even if unbeknownst to them, the gravitas of a celebrity is hard to hide...

AvatarFrame48.name: Responsibilities of a Disciplinarian
AvatarFrame48.description: I shall maintain the discipline of Mirroria School!

AvatarFrame49.name: Part-time Job
AvatarFrame49.description: You'll often see her sitting in Mirafleur Hall or at the Security Force entrance. However, in principle, she should stay at the Furnace Core Site, right?

AvatarFrame50.name: Carpe Diem
AvatarFrame50.description: Seize the day. You never know what will happen.

AvatarFrame51.name: Speed Chaser
AvatarFrame51.description: Lighting up your path to the future with my taillights!

AvatarFrame53.name: Annual Harvest
AvatarFrame53.description: Share your great harvest with friends.

Avatar03.name: Shirli
Avatar03.description: Remember not to burn the food again!

Avatar04.name: Zeke
Avatar04.description: I want to spend my days with my family in peace and quiet, but that's just an unrealistic delusion in the last days.

Avatar05.name: Frigg
Avatar05.description: Perhaps she'd appreciate you if you weren't opposing her?

Avatar06.name: Nemesis
Avatar06.description: Are you Shirli or something else now?

Avatar08.name: Seele
Avatar08.description: The adorable appearance befits the playful cruelty.

Avatar09.name: Tata
Avatar09.description: A lazy smart servant who offers the help you need when necessary.

Avatar10.name: Happy New Year
Avatar10.description: I wanted to personally give this to you—a New Year's gift from Mi-a.

Avatar11.name: May All Go Well
Avatar11.description: I believe these are called "fireworks"...? I wonder if they would look nicer on your Jetpack...

Avatar12.name: Angel Frigg
Avatar12.description: She isn't a demon, after all.

Avatar13.name: Alf
Avatar13.description: Alf looks like a lucky cat! Could it bring me good luck if I hug it every day?

Avatar14.name: Peanut
Avatar14.description: The first-gen smart servant with outstanding performance. Your trustworthy friend.

Avatar16.name: Mad Dimon
Avatar16.description: Mad Dimon, a once-popular electric pet, is now your smart servant companion.

Avatar17.name: Tartarus
Avatar17.description: Its prototype was the most popular children's toy before the Cataclysm. Recently, its manufacturer has invented a brand new smart servant called "Tartarus."

Avatar18.name: Infernal steel lizard
Avatar18.description: What are you staring at? Taste my steel lizard tail!

Avatar19.name: Song of the Puppet
Avatar19.description: She was shouting, she was dancing, and she was sobbing.

Avatar20.name: Dolly
Avatar20.description: Dolly is unique to me, and I am unique to Dolly...

Avatar21.name: Mi-a's Dream
Avatar21.description: While asleep, does Mi-a dream about... me and Shirli?

Avatar22.name: Strawberry Afternoon
Avatar22.description: Why does the crow look like a desk?

Avatar23.name: Hanna
Avatar23.description: Welcome to Cetus Island! Let me show you around.

Avatar24.name: Sticky Rice Ball
Avatar24.description: Let me guess, am I holding a sweet dumpling or meat dumpling? Oh, I've got it right!

Avatar25.name: Pure White Core
Avatar25.description: Purple fades, and while light shone through. It's a new force that can light up the night sky.

Avatar27.name: Celebration Memories
Avatar27.description: Do you remember the funny things that happened at the Graceday Celebration, little goldfish?

Avatar28.name: Summer Celebration Mechanic
Avatar28.description: Testing the new entertainment equipment is for the celebration activities, while she adjusted herself through the celebration.

Avatar29.name: Fledgling
Avatar29.description: This is the first person you meet at the beginning of a new, clean slate journey.

Avatar30.name: Joy Ride
Avatar30.description: Little Red Riding Hood carefully prepared a basket full of snacks and went out to play with her sister!

Avatar31.name: Fruity Summer
Avatar31.description: The essential cooldown for a scorching summer! Mi-a can't resist sweet frozen watermelons!

Avatar32.name: Rare Holiday
Avatar32.description: She needs more rest than she thought. That's not a bad thing, is it?

Avatar33.name: Traveling Shirli
Avatar33.description: The last stop of the journey: Mirroria!

Avatar34.name: Saki Fuwa the Disciplinarian
Avatar34.description: Who would've thought that the anime fangirl at every limited-merch sale would be so strict at school!

Avatar35.name: Reliable Mechanic
Avatar35.description: At least, that's how she refers to herself...

QuestItem_h202005.name: Seasoned Pasta
QuestItem_h202005.source: Said to be the favorite of a certain member of the Hyenas. Is this really alright?

Mount_005.name: Dust Wheeler
Mount_005.description: Crude and eye-catching. If it's presence and personality you're after, look no further. However, since someone noticed its antennae looks like little feelers, everyone started to think it was rather cute, which in turn attracted more buyers. Duplicates are converted to 100 dark crystals and 20,000 gold.

Mount_006.name: Crimson Meteor
Mount_006.description:
Glamorous! Radiant! It's the brightest crimson star in your vehicle collection!
Note: Crimson Meteor cannot hit triple speed. Please drive carefully.

Mount_007.name: Mechbird
Mount_007.description:
The new vehicle designed and built by Cobalt-B that is both fun and practical.
Cobalt-B had some rather unique names planned, but the marketing department put the kibosh on it: an easy-to-remember name is a good name.

Mount_008.name: Aidan Knight
Mount_008.description: Although this motorcycle is small, it is wholly equipped. Low cost, energy-efficient, with sufficient storage space, it is not only an excellent choice for couriers, but has become popular among traveling merchants in recent years.

Mount_002_a.name: Magnetic Rod
Mount_002_a.description:
This is not for hanging clothes out to dry!

An abandoned tower in the Rusty Belt. Is someone trying to put something on it?

Mount_002_b.name: Maglev Stalker
Mount_002_b.description:
It's not a sweeper droid!

The Vermin Brothers' cherished possession and possibly a future table prop. Low-probability drop from the Vermin Brothers.

Mount_003_a.name: Omnium Beast: Cockpit
Mount_003_a.description:
A comfy cabin that jolts when moving?

The workers on the drilling rig probably missed something.

Mount_003_b.name: Omnium Beast: Left Arm
Mount_003_b.description:
An Omnium-powered left arm of the cyberbeast. Please remain in your cabin and do not ride on the arm.

A gift from Bai Ling for those proficient in puzzle-solving in the shelter.

Mount_003_c.name: Omnium Beast: Right Arm
Mount_003_c.description:
An Omnium-powered right arm of the cyberbeast. Please remain in your cabin and do not ride on the arm.

Behemoths wandering Banges, Navia, and Crown are probably equipped with it. Low-probability drop from Behemoth - Surtur, Behemoth - Bergelmir, Behemoth - Fárbauti, Behemoth - Mimir, and Behemoth - Utgarda.

Mount_011_a.name: Voyager Engine
Mount_011_a.description:
"Voyager exclusive!" the user manual warns in a bright font. But it's almost never seen with the component.

The workers on the drilling rig probably missed something.

Mount_011_b.name: Voyager Thruster
Mount_011_b.description:
Compact and versatile with all the essential parts... Actually, every part is essential.

The Four Powers in the Navia region could carry it. Low-probability drop from Four Powers - Okka, Four Powers - Hethlu, Four Powers - Smoli, and Four Powers - Sendyrs.

Mount_011_c.name: Voyager Control Station
Mount_011_c.description:
Control station for the Voyager. It compels you to shout "Onward!" for some reason.

The Heirs of Aida hid stuff in their base on the dock.

Mount_011_d.name: Voyager Hull
Mount_011_d.description:
The first thing you'll want to do is give it a new paint job...

Hykros researchers would leave practical tools in the Ecological Stations in Navia.

Mount_004_a.name: Unicorn Power Core
Mount_004_a.description:
This vehicle engine is patent-pending, so no reverse engineering.

You might find something around the marvelous ore.

Mount_004_b.name: Unicorn Bionic Frame
Mount_004_b.description:
Hykros scholars once had a big fight over the material choice for bionics. The two sides submitted their own papers... So did the side with more papers win?

The dawn of new grounds for the Aida Bastion has come.

Mount_004_c.name: Unicorn Cyberlimbs
Mount_004_c.description:
"Cyberlimbs are cool!"... Wonder how many people that slogan will draw to buy the Monocross.

It's probably exhausting hauling boxes up the tower in Saag Passage.

Mount_004_d.name: Unicorn Head
Mount_004_d.description:
The head is armed with defensive blades, but they're often treated as accessories, hence the "Unicorn" moniker. Wonder how the creator feels about that.

Devotees of the Hyenas in the Crown region might carry it. Low-probability drop from Devotee Noah and Devotee Eber.

Mount_013.description:
Complete the mission Franz's Gift to use.
A unique cube-shaped vehicle. Its built-in floating power unit allows it to move easily, even on bumpy roads. However, its flashy tape lights make it looks like a moving disco ball, and it is particularly obvious at night.

aige.name: Echo
aige.description: Good or bad? You be the judge.

bailing.name: Bai Ling
bailing.description: Could you stop looking at me like that? You're embarrassing me.

gulan.name: Cobalt-B
gulan.description: Through the blue cobalt glass, we can observe the actual color of the flame of burning metal.

hida.name: Hilda
hida.description: Move your body to the music by the sea. Let your thoughts drift with the waves to the other side.

kekelite.name: Cocoritter
kekelite.description: Sugar, stuffed toys, and all the sweet and gentle things in the world.

kelaodiya.name: Claudia
kelaodiya.description: Come to me if you need any help. I'll do my best.

king.description: I've been told millions of times that there's a fierce look in my eyes. Not sure how much these sunglasses will help with that.

ling.name: Zero
ling.description: Analyzing data. Please don't bother me for now.

saimier.name: Samir
saimier.description: There must be an unsolvable mystery, an endless road, and an unpredictable future.

sifengyuanyu.name: Tsubasa
sifengyuanyu.description: Her eyes wander because she's always on guard for the invisible dangers in the air.

peipei.name: Pepper
peipei.description: Wearing a smile at work is a demand she requires of herself.

wuwan.name: Crow
wuwan.description: As an entertainer, I certainly want your eyes on me all the time.

xiluo.name: Shiro
xiluo.description: Keep your distance and be patient. A gentle reminder: you might get attacked by the kitty claw if you stare at her for too long.

xiuma.name: Huma
xiuma.description: Like a blank piece of paper waiting for you to paint on it.

make.name: Marc
make.description: Every one of us is a unique creation.

baiyuekui.name: Bai Yuekui
baiyuekui.description: All sentient beings share the same pure and perfect spark essence of enlightenment.

Item_Mini_Echo01.name: Acoustic Module A-01
Item_Mini_Echo01.description: A part designed for a special sound-tracing system. Highly concealable.

Item_Mini_Echo02.name: Acoustic Module A-02
Item_Mini_Echo02.description: A part designed for a special sound-tracing system. Highly concealable.

Item_Mini_Echo03.name: Acoustic Module A-03
Item_Mini_Echo03.description: A part designed for a special sound-tracing system. Highly concealable.

item_sharephotocoin.name: Amusement park
item_sharephotocoin.description: Obtained by playing amusement facilities on the Cetus Island. Use them to exchange for Cetus Island exclusive rewards at Enfi on the island.
item_sharephotocoin.source: Exchange for Cetus Island exclusive rewards

SystemTreasureMap.name: Scattered Signal
SystemTreasureMap.description: Obtained by joining the Hopkins event. Find Omnium Beacons by following the signal and obtain rewards.

SystemTreasureMap2.name: Scattered Signal
SystemTreasureMap2.description: Obtained by joining the Hopkins event. Find Omnium Beacons by following the signal and obtain rewards.

SystemTreasureMap3.name: Scattered Signal
SystemTreasureMap3.description: Obtained by joining the Hopkins event. Find Omnium Beacons by following the signal and obtain rewards.

Item_HopkinsOrder.name: Hopkins Order
Item_HopkinsOrder.description: Pass for participation in events like Lost Signal and Dreamscape Challenge.
Item_HopkinsOrder.source: Join the Hopkins Order Event and get it daily.

Title_1_6_1_1.name: Champion Shopkeeper
Title_1_6_1_1.description: Achieve 1,500 revenue in Aida Cafe to unlock

xinshoubuji.name: Rookie Supplies
xinshoubuji.source: Use to obtain the items in the Rookie Supplies, or receive tanium ×60 plus dark crystal ×60 if already obtained.

maoxianlibao.name: Adventure Pack
maoxianlibao.source: Use to obtain the items in the Adventure Pack, or receive tanium ×300 plus dark crystal ×300 if already obtained.

Item_q600410_Probe.name: Probe
Item_q600410_Probe.description: Device launched by Hykros into other dimensions

Title_1_4_2_1.name: Crown of Thorns
Title_1_4_2_1.description: Rank No.1 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_2_2.name: Heroic Trailblazer
Title_1_4_2_2.description: Rank No.2 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_2_3.name: Brave Trailblazer
Title_1_4_2_3.description: Rank No.3 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_2_4.name: Explorer
Title_1_4_2_4.description: Rank No.4 or No.5 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_2_5.name: Footsetter
Title_1_4_2_5.description: Rank No.6–10 on the server in Bygone Phantasm at the results tally.

Title_1_4_1_1.name: Crown of Stars
Title_1_4_1_1.description: Rank No.1 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_1_4_1_2.name: Heroic Starchaser
Title_1_4_1_2.description: Rank No.2 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_1_4_1_3.name: Brave Starchaser
Title_1_4_1_3.description: Rank No.3 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_1_4_1_4.name: Rival
Title_1_4_1_4.description: Rank No.4 or No.5 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Title_1_4_1_5.name: Challenger
Title_1_4_1_5.description: Rank No.6–10 on the server in Apex League at the results tally.

Item_FireworkQuest_Mine.name: Fireworks Component
Item_FireworkQuest_Mine.description: Key component for fireworks. Give it to Slayer, and you're guaranteed to see fireworks. You'll only see them sometimes if you don't.

Item_firework.name: Black niter
Item_firework.description: A rare rock from Aida used for making fireworks and not much else.
Item_firework.source: Can be used to activate the fireworks scattered throughout Aesperia.

Item_Incarnation_01.name: Offering points
Item_Incarnation_01.description: Special tokens minted by Hykros to encourage collecting mana bio samples.
Item_Incarnation_01.source: Trade in mana bio samples for offering points that are redeemable for rewards in the Commissary.

Item_manasample.name: Mana bio sample
Item_manasample.description: Unknown biological sample. Store with caution.
Item_manasample.source: Submit mana bio samples for offering points that are redeemable for rewards in the Commissary.

Item_Gashapon_coin_01.name: Cetus Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_01.description: The gachapon coin that carries the best wishes of all the little Smart Servants on Cetus Island will definitely bring good luck!
Item_Gashapon_coin_01.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Cetus Carnival

Item_Gashapon_coin_02.name: Golden Sands Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_02.description: A gachapon coin engraved with a pyramid pattern, bringing the desert into the palm of your hand.
Item_Gashapon_coin_02.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Golden Sands.

Item_Gashapon_coin_03.name: Starry Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_03.description: A gachapon coin engraved with stars, bringing the music of the starry night to your ears.
Item_Gashapon_coin_03.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Wheel of Stars.

Item_Gashapon_coin_04.name: Fantasy Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_04.description: A fantasy gachapon coin. Hold it tight in your hand, so you know it's real.
Item_Gashapon_coin_04.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Wheel of Fantasy

Item_Gashapon_coin_05.name: Wormwood Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_05.description: A gachapon coin with the fragrance of wormwood. It makes for a good collectible probably.
Item_Gashapon_coin_05.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Wormwood's Aroma

Item_Gashapon_coin_06.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_06.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!
Item_Gashapon_coin_06.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Pure White

Item_Gashapon_coin_07.name: Seabreeze Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_07.description: A gachapon coin with the salty smell of the sea breeze. It's time to go on a vacation!
Item_Gashapon_coin_07.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Summer Seabreeze

Item_Gashapon_coin_08.name: Memories Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_08.description: Whenever you stop to look, memories come flooding in.
Item_Gashapon_coin_08.source: Used for the event gachapon of the Depths of Memory

Item_Gashapon_coin_09.name: Crimson Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_09.description: A magical item described in the picture book Crimson Tales. It's said to be chocolate-scented?
Item_Gashapon_coin_09.source: Used for the event gachapon of Crimson Ruby

Item_Gashapon_coin_12.name: Remembrance Gachapon Coin
Item_Gashapon_coin_12.description: A gachapon coin that contains wonderful memories. The summer breeze blew away the youthful worries...
Item_Gashapon_coin_12.source: Used for The Best Years event gachapon

Item_Gashapon_coin_15.name: Pure White Gachapon Coin (Reissue)
Item_Gashapon_coin_15.description: A gachapon coin that refracts the light from pure white core. This gachapon coin is also really... an ultimate one!
Item_Gashapon_coin_15.source: Used for the Pure White (Reissue) event gachapon

Item_Enlightenment.name: Star Grit
Item_Enlightenment.description: Scattered debris that fell along with the other planet from above. Reflects the luster of the stars.
Item_Enlightenment.source: Participate in the Path of Enlightenment event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_Enlightenment_02.name: Star scatter
Item_Enlightenment_02.description: Fine shards of stars that refract the light from outer space.
Item_Enlightenment_02.source: Participate in the Starcrossed Sky event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_ChildrensDayCoin.name: Bubbles
Item_ChildrensDayCoin.source: Magical bubbles obtained from the Childlike Innocence event. Can be redeemed for rewards at the event store.

Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.name: Enigmatic Badge
Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.description: The badge given to the HOTTA Studio's Enigmatic Lattice event participants. Come one, come all!
Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.source: Participate in the Enigmatic Lattice event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Store

Item_TowerDefenceCoin_01.name: Guardian Badge
Item_TowerDefenceCoin_01.description: An exquisitely designed badge. It represents great honor to Guardians.
Item_TowerDefenceCoin_01.source: Participate in the Dreamscape Guardian event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_SummerCoin_01.name: Heat Wave Coin
Item_SummerCoin_01.description: A token obtained from Graceday celebration in Banges Port. The passion of Banges' residents that handcrafted them still remains within them. As Graceday's official currency, they can be exchanged for rewards at the booths in all major markets.
Item_SummerCoin_01.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_SummerCoin_02.name: Heat Wave Coin
Item_SummerCoin_02.description: A token obtained from Graceday celebration in Banges Port. The passion of Banges' residents that handcrafted them still remains within them. As Graceday's official currency, they can be exchanged for rewards at the booths in all major markets.
Item_SummerCoin_02.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_MidAutumnCoin_01.name: Star sand
Item_MidAutumnCoin_01.description: The bottle is filled with childhood dreams.
Item_MidAutumnCoin_01.source: Can be obtained from the Echo Protocol, Mirroria Fastlane, or Star Sand Recycling events. Can be redeemed for rewards at the Event Store.

Item_AutumnCoin_01.name: Currency
Item_AutumnCoin_01.source: Obtained from participating in xx. Can be redeemed for rewards at the event store.

Item_CountryDay_Coin.name: Rainbow token
Item_CountryDay_Coin.description: A token that is handed out during the carnival in Mirroria. The brilliant lights embedded in each one add a nice touch to the lively atmosphere, but it would have been nicer if they came with batteries that lasted longer...
Item_CountryDay_Coin.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_Aida_token.name: Aida Keepsake
Item_Aida_token.description: Judgement is nigh. A new day shall dawn in fire.
Item_Aida_token.source: Activity item that can be used to exchange goods at the Keepsake Store during the event.

Item_Aida_token_02.name: Aida Keepsake
Item_Aida_token_02.description: Judgement is nigh. A new day shall dawn in fire.
Item_Aida_token_02.source: Activity item that can be used to exchange goods at the Keepsake Store during the event.

Item_Aida_photo_token.name: Encrypted Disk
Item_Aida_photo_token.description: A heavily encrypted disk with critical data. Maybe someone in Hykros can crack it...?
Item_Aida_photo_token.source: Activity item that can be used to exchange goods at the Keepsake Store during the event.

Mount_014.name: Heavy Engine
Mount_014.description: A batch of retro yet high-tech heavy engines reclaimed from the ruins of an auto plant. Lighthouse R&D's modifications enable them to speed over winding roads and counterstrike gorgers.

activation1.name: Activation Core I
activation1.description: A rare live bio-sample, with great research value.
activation1.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

activation2.name: Revitalized Energy Body
activation2.description: Revitalized energy body from the defeated raiding target. It may be of great interest to the researchers at Hykros.
activation2.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.name: Pacemaker Emblem
Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.description:
An emblem earned from the Mirroria Tour, hosted by the HOTTA Studio. See Mirroria from an all-new perspective!
Can be redeemed for items from the Mirroria Tour event store.
Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Mirroria Tour Event Store.

item_GreatRegression_coin.name: Proof of Stellarway
item_GreatRegression_coin.description: Executors returning from the break, I hope all of you haven't forgotten how to fight, and better believe that all efforts shall be rewarded.
item_GreatRegression_coin.source: Can be exchanged for goods at the Stellarway Store.

hopkins1.name: Gold-backed card
hopkins1.description: Apparently accepted as currency at the Banges Black Market.
hopkins1.source: Obtain by joining the Hopkins order event

hopkins2.name: Proof of credit
hopkins2.description: You've got to win Hopkins' trust if you want the best goods from his Black Market. Prove yourself a worthy customer.
hopkins2.source: Obtain by joining the Hopkins order event

Mount006_1_Skin_01.name: Smoothie Meteor
Mount006_1_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Comes with free dessert coupons. Are you sure you don't want to try the new smoothie?

Mount006_2_Skin_01.name: Surveyor Meteor
Mount006_2_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
A vehicle made with reference to the appearance of a famous oceanologist. Well, the cute expression, though, could make the oceanologist both hate and love the vehicle at the same time, I guess?

Mount006_3_Skin_01.name: Arena Meteor
Mount006_3_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
A small number of past arena audience members wished that he'd leave a small autograph on the vehicle... But it'd probably cost a fortune by doing it on each one.

Mount006_4_Skin_01.name: Absconder Meteor
Mount006_4_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
If he comes to us for the copyright payment, just tell him that the related personnel has already been fired.

Mount006_5_Skin_01.name: Windrunner Meteor
Mount006_5_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
The performance should be identical to other models, yet it feels faster riding in this one.

Mount006_6_Skin_01.name: Freedom Meteor
Mount006_6_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
When will we race on another planet? Freedom Meteor is ready!

Mount006_7_Skin_01.name: Roaming Meteor
Mount006_7_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Could it be an illusion that I always feel like an ace when I'm on this thing? Or maybe it's not an illusion at all?

Mount006_8_Skin_01.name: Scuba Meteor
Mount006_8_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its reinforced carapace can adapt to greater pressure underwater... But this was not meant to be operated undersea.

Mount006_9_Skin_01.name: Supercomputing Meteor
Mount006_9_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Equipped with a mini supercomputer that can deal with all kinds of road surfaces. It's just sometimes the computer is too small to handle a large amount of calculations, and errors could occur.

Mount006_10_Skin_01.name: Modular Meteor
Mount006_10_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Even a homebody can be a skilled driver thanks to the training they received in racing games.

Mount006_11_Skin_01.name: Nightfeather Meteor
Mount006_11_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Sweeping past the corners like a nightfeather. Are you sure you don't want a race?

Mount006_12_Skin_01.name: Reminiscent Meteor
Mount006_12_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Sit in this beauty and be a bright star shooting across the sky.

Mount006_13_Skin_01.name: Phantasmic Meteor
Mount006_13_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
One could dream of lightning-fast rides in this vehicle.

Mount006_14_Skin_01.name: Steady Meteor
Mount006_14_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
You would unconsciously slow down and drive safely in this one―Hey! What are these little critters doing behind us?

Mount006_15_Skin_01.name: DIY Meteor
Mount006_15_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Did some modifications to it when I happened to see it the other day. Not sure if its performance gets affected...

Mount006_16_Skin_01.name: Rockin' Meteor
Mount006_16_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its music system has fifty Aida hit songs preloaded. Turn up the tunes, and go for a ride.

Mount006_17_Skin_01.name: Justice Meteor
Mount006_17_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Take this buddy with you on your journey of justice and redemption.

Mount006_18_Skin_01.name: Snow Rose Meteor
Mount006_18_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
It's said that you will impress the Queen of Snow Roses if you race and win the championship in this vehicle.
Mount006_18_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle — Snow Rose Meteor.

Mount006_19_Skin_01.name: Electrovision Meteor
Mount006_19_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Features fluorescent lights on gold paint to catch everyone's attention.

Mount006_20_Skin_01.name: Neon Meteor
Mount006_20_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Whoever drives it will definitely be the brightest neon lighting on the street.

Mount006_21_Skin_01.name: Inspirational Meteor
Mount006_21_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
You could seize inspiration before it disappears when driving around in this vehicle.

Mount006_22_Skin_01.name: Miraculous Meteor
Mount006_22_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Restart and seize the future... with you.

Mount006_23_Skin_01.name: Glowing Meteor
Mount006_23_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Though this is a vehicle invented by a rebel, you should still follow the traffic rules while driving it.

Mount006_24_Skin_01.name: Frosty Meteor
Mount006_24_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Equipped with a powerful fridge and air conditioning. Not a bad idea to refit it as a beverage truck.

Mount006_25_Skin_01.name: EM Meteor
Mount006_25_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Unlike other vehicles, this one has an extra battery as the backup energy source. One can drive without worrying about running out of energy in Omnium-scarce areas.

Mount006_26_Skin_01.name: Pouncing Cat Meteor
Mount006_26_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Its music system was preloaded with sounds of cats in it. This might give you an edge when hunting down rodents. "Kitty is out for hunting! Where is the target? Give an order!"
Mount006_26_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle — Pouncing Cat Meteor.

Mount006_27_Skin_01.name: Flame Chaser Meteor
Mount006_27_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Transform into a shooting star on fire that no one can pass in a race.
Mount006_27_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle — Flame Chaser Meteor.

Mount006_28_Skin_01.name: Med Meteor
Mount006_28_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
Comes with a medical kit for safe journeys.

Mount006_29_Skin_01.name: Wishing Meteor
Mount006_29_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
If you happen to see a meteor shower while driving this vehicle, make a wish, and it might come true.

TFB_drop_2x.name: Joint Supply Chip I
TFB_drop_2x.description: These supplies are prepared for Executors participating in Joint Operations by Hykros. The Executors have a higher chance to obtain advanced equipment after using the chip.
TFB_drop_2x.source: After use, the next 3 times of consuming Vitality for opening the Joint Operation Box will double the chance of obtaining Master equipment and Ultimate equipment.

TFB_drop_3x.name: Joint supply chip II
TFB_drop_3x.description: These supplies are prepared for Executors participating in Joint Operations by Hykros. The Executors have a higher chance to obtain advanced equipment after using the chip.
TFB_drop_3x.source: After use, the next 3 times of consuming Vitality for opening the Joint Operation Box will triple the chance of obtaining Master equipment and Ultimate equipment.

TFB_drop_4x.name: Joint supply chip III
TFB_drop_4x.description: These supplies are prepared for Executors participating in Joint Operations by Hykros. The Executors have a higher chance to obtain advanced equipment after using the chip.
TFB_drop_4x.source: After use, the next 3 times of consuming Vitality for opening the Joint Operation Box will quadruple the chance of obtaining Master equipment and Ultimate equipment.

Mount_007_a.name: Mechbird: Head
Mount_007_a.description: "Want me to design the new vehicle? Okay, first, the child-like exterior will attract attention..."

Mount_007_b.name: Mechbird: Torso
Mount_007_b.description: "Trunk space or the radio... I don't want to give up either one..."

Mount_007_c.name: Mechbird: Legs
Mount_007_c.description: "It won't crumble even under a truckload of fallen fruit. Probably."

Mount_007_d.name: Mechbird: Core
Mount_007_d.description: "The newest creation from R&D. I had the kid try it out, and it's surprisingly comfortable."

Title_1_6_1_2.name: Star Pastry Chef
Title_1_6_1_2.description: Unlocks by participating in the Sweets Workshop event.

Item_Fashion_CostVoucher.name: Beauty Beauty Voucher
Item_Fashion_CostVoucher.description: Would you like Celine to help you clean up again?
Item_Fashion_CostVoucher.source: Used to offset expenses incurred when changing the outfit, appearance, etc.

Title_1_1_6_1.name: Island Pioneer
Title_1_1_6_1.description: A title obtained after reaching 100% exploration on Artificial Island.

DevelopLog_1.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 1
DevelopLog_1.description:
Starting log...
It's early in the morning, and Mr. Kolador said there'd been an unusual retracement on the Artificial Island we're developing. How is that possible? He must be making a fuss. Retracement is a core technology of Hykros that only they can master. As an ordinary technician, if I can make it happen...
Um..? There really is a transient unstable retracement, which seems to be related to the spacerift. I gotta fix it quickly. Am I losing my job? Maybe I'm qualified for Hykros now...?

DevelopLog_2.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 2
DevelopLog_2.description:
Starting log...
Today, we've debugged the spacerift on Artificial Island. All was normal, and everything went on smoothly. Mr. Kolador is such a wonderful man, as he didn't give me a hard time due to the rewind incident. However, my friend wasn't as lucky since he was fired by Cobalt-B today. Regardless of how I asked, he refused to tell me the reason. Yet, all that came out of his mouth was the word, moodcard, which I have absolutely no clue about.
It was probably some embarrassing mistake. After all, Cobalt-B holds such a high bar.

DevelopLog_3.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 3
DevelopLog_3.description:
Starting log...
My colleagues have all gone bonkers! These fools have taken advantage of the SSR weapons Hykros provided for the people of Aesperia and started a fight with the Hyenas on the Artificial Island.
You're just technicians, not Executors! So, get back to work! I'm the only one here working my butt off! If you were to read this log of mine, my esteemed Mr. Kolador, I'd hope you'll consider giving me a raise since that's definitely the best way to affirm my value. With that said, should I choose Dual EM Stars or Rosy Edge?

DevelopLog_4.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 4
DevelopLog_4.description:
Starting log...
Last night, I went to Cetus Island on my lonesome to watch the fireworks. Not only was it spectacular, but the music was also wonderful. That's why I proposed to Mr. Kolador that we should set off fireworks all day long on Artificial Island. However, he rejected the romantic proposal on the grounds that it might blow up the island's barrier.
If Dr. Claire requires a staff member who's not just a puppet, I'm willing to join her... Never mind, please delete this paragraph. Mr. Kolador was quite right in what he said. That was thoughtless of me, and there's still so much I have to learn from him.

DevelopLog_5.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 5
DevelopLog_5.description:
Starting log...
Right now, I'm logging with my "little feet," stomping on the keyboard. Hykros' stuff is so unstable! Their weapons went haywire and shrunk me to the size of a needlebee, and I almost got swatted by the Executors!
Development on the Artificial Island will have to be put on hold today. After all, it's too inconvenient for this "tiny me" to work. Mr. Kolador would understand me. Hopefully, Hykros will solve this problem within a week.

DevelopLog_6.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 6
DevelopLog_6.description:
Starting log...
I'm so excited, so excited! You have no idea what I saw today! I met Ms. Bai from the "other planet" in Navia! She was on a mission, but I'm sure she noticed me!
Although she was far away, she must have seen me! Yes, I felt it! Initiate Hykros Special Order, and search for "Alaya"...

DevelopLog_7.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 7
DevelopLog_7.description:
Starting log...
I should be on my vacation now, but there is a new problem with the Artificial Island... So here I am again. Right now, everyone outside the Artificial Island must be setting off fireworks... I could really use a nap right now... a nap... right now... ZZzzz

DevelopLog_8.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 8
DevelopLog_8.description:
Starting log...
The vacation is over, and the Artificial Island is stable for now. I hope Mr. Kolador will give me an extra reward for my performance during the vacation! Besides, I found something suspicious today! It's so suspicious! A colleague of mine came back from his vacation with very thick hair!
He used to be just like me... No, even worse than me! What on earth did he do during the vacation?! Perhaps I should go and ask him about it...

DevelopLog_9.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 9
DevelopLog_9.description:
Starting log...
There has been a minor issue with Banges recently, but Hykros managed the situation well. Now, some Banges residents, including me, are in quarantine. But! Quarantine won't stop me from developing the Artificial Island! Just connect to the Artificial Island server remotely, and I can start the work of love! Ah... the connection is so poor...
Hope everyone in Banges can get better quickly, and for all of Aida to get better, come on!

DevelopLog_10.name: Artificial Island Developer's Logs 10
DevelopLog_10.description:
Starting log...
The construction of Artificial Island Phase 1 is almost complete. What is most crucial right now is to drive the Hyenas away, and the quickest solution for that would be to request The Executor Order for assistance. Gosh, I'm so clever! Anyways, I'll suggest it to Mr. Kolador right this instant...
I've heard from a friend of Hykros that they've recently gotten hold of Vera's spacetime coordinates. I'd love to be able to head on over there to take a look once I'm done with my work on the Artificial Island...

BreakFate_InnerCoin.name: Break From Destiny coin
BreakFate_InnerCoin.description: An exquisitely designed badge. It represents great honor to Guardians.

Mount006_30_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.

Mount006_31_Skin_01.name: Scarlet Meteor
Mount006_31_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Meteoric line of vehicles.
It's said that it can help you forget about your troubles when driving this vehicle.

bupoxiao.description: I will attack in Saki Fuwa form.

fragment_Mount012_2_Skin_01.name: Leaper Shard
fragment_Mount012_2_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It may appear to be customized for a kid, but a Jerboa is a Jerboa!
fragment_Mount012_2_Skin_01.source: Collect 2 shards to unlock the vehicle Leaper

Mount012_1_Skin_01.name: Jumping Smart Servant
Mount012_1_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It's a customized version for a certain Wanderer and their lady companion. This smart servant must hold special meaning to the pair.
Mount012_1_Skin_01.source: Unlock the vehicle Jumping Smart Servant

Mount012_2_Skin_01.name: Leaper
Mount012_2_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It may appear to be customized for a kid, but a Jerboa is a Jerboa!

Mount012_3_Skin_01.name: Ultimate Jerboa
Mount012_3_Skin_01.description:
One of the rare models in the Jerboa all-terrain vehicles.
It is named the Super Ultimate in hopes that its owner would also have super ultimate justice and valor!

v222003_HOTTAcard_01.name: HOTTA Studio Temporary Staff Card
v222003_HOTTAcard_01.description: The temporary staff card of HOTTA Studio only allows access to certain places. It is engraved with the user's name and personal information. A well-known company in Mirroria, HOTTA Studio focuses on game development and entertainment services.

Item_AbyssWorld_01.name: R&D Permission Card
Item_AbyssWorld_01.description: Permission Card of the department head, used to activate a certain device.

Item_AbyssWorld_02.name: Emergency Response Permission Card
Item_AbyssWorld_02.description: Permission Card of the department head, used to activate a certain device.

Item_AbyssWorld_03.name: Engineering Permission Card
Item_AbyssWorld_03.description: Permission Card of the department head, used to activate a certain device.

Item_AbyssWorld_04.name: Project Administration Permission Card
Item_AbyssWorld_04.description: Permission Card of the department head, used to activate a certain device.

Item_AbyssWorld_05.name: Expedition Permission Card
Item_AbyssWorld_05.description: Permission Card of the department head, used to activate a certain device.

Item_ExpCard_10k.name: Combat Logs Chip I
Item_ExpCard_10k.description: Contains combat logs. Use to get EXP.

Item_ExpCard_100k.name: Combat Logs Chip II
Item_ExpCard_100k.description: Contains combat logs. Use to get EXP.

Item_ExpCard_500k.name: Combat Logs Chip III
Item_ExpCard_500k.description: Contains combat logs. Use to get EXP.

imitation_fashion_26.name: No Fear of the Sun
imitation_fashion_26.description: UV rays are the enemy of all women... But she seems to enjoy bathing in the sunlight.
imitation_fashion_26.source: Unlock the premium Simulacrum No Fear of the Sun and the weapon appearance Sunny Breeze.

imitation_fashion_26_w.name: Sunny Breeze
imitation_fashion_26_w.description: Taking a vacation between consecutive jobs is worth a change in mood. Just tap a few times on your phone for a change of paint.
imitation_fashion_26_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Sunny Breeze

imitation_fashion_22.name: Ultimate Pure White
imitation_fashion_22.description: "Ultimate justice! Ultimate valor!! The Ultimate Warriors who give Night City ultimate protection! Elegant, pure, mighty! Super, super ultimate!"
imitation_fashion_22.source: Unlock the premium Simulacrum Ultimate Pure White

imitation_fashion_22_w.name: Pure Innocent Heart
imitation_fashion_22_w.description: The impeccable power has granted Heartstream with a new look.
imitation_fashion_22_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Pure Innocent Heart

imitation_fashion_21.name: Crimson Song
imitation_fashion_21.description: The little girl receives the red cloak from her sister. Wow, she gets so excited that she forgets to hide her tail!
imitation_fashion_21.source: Unlock the premium Simulacrum Crimson Song

imitation_fashion_21_w.name: Falling Flames
imitation_fashion_21_w.description: A magical creation that contains mysterious energy in the picture book Crimson Tale. It's also Little Red Riding Hood's closest friend.
imitation_fashion_21_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Falling Flames

imitation_fashion_21_bag.name: Crimson Song & Falling Flames
imitation_fashion_21_bag.description: The little girl receives the red cloak from her sister. Wow, she gets so excited that she forgets to hide her tail!
imitation_fashion_21_bag.source: Use to get the premium Simulacrum Crimson Song and the weapon appearance Falling Flames.

imitation_fashion_17.name: Shirli
imitation_fashion_17.description: It's an image extracted from memories... It's just an illusion.

imitation_fashion_17_w.name: White Dwarf
imitation_fashion_17_w.description: A shining star might look small, but it gives off unimaginable energy.
imitation_fashion_17_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance White Dwarf

imitation_fashion_10.name: Argent Intuition
imitation_fashion_10.description: It's difficult to find a balance between formal attire and work clothes. Only she insists that true art is a mix of practicality and artistry...
imitation_fashion_10.source: Unlock the premium Simulacrum Argent Intuition

imitation_fashion_10_w.name: Silver Flame Revolver
imitation_fashion_10_w.description: It would be great if I could apply paints of all colors to the flame... but there are still many technical problems to overcome.
imitation_fashion_10_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Silver Flame Revolver

Item_PanelKey_FoxCave.name: Activation Module
Item_PanelKey_FoxCave.source: Can be used to activate the dormant control console.

linye.name: Lin
linye.description: She did allow her fans to use her photos, provided that it was not for commercial purposes, and only minor post-processing was done.

Item_battery.name: Energy activation charger
Item_battery.description: Special material used to power machines
Item_battery.source: Can be used to increase Appointed Research progress.

Title_1_4_5_1.name: Top Ten
Title_1_4_5_1.description: Get in the top ten of Break From Destiny to unlock this title.

fragment_reactor_orange.name: Fortress microreactor shard
fragment_reactor_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides stats support.
fragment_reactor_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse one of the following fortress microreactor types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, Arc.

fragment_reactor1_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Overload)
fragment_reactor1_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides physical support.
fragment_reactor1_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Overload)

fragment_reactor2_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Glaze)
fragment_reactor2_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides frost support.
fragment_reactor2_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Glaze)

fragment_reactor3_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Burst)
fragment_reactor3_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides flame support.
fragment_reactor3_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Burst)

fragment_reactor4_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Arc)
fragment_reactor4_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides volt support.
fragment_reactor4_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Arc)

fragment_reactor5_orange.name: Fortress Microreactor Shard (Altered)
fragment_reactor5_orange.description: A new high-efficiency reactor developed by District 7 R&D that provides altered-type support.
fragment_reactor5_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress microreactor (Altered)

fragment_reactor_purple.name: Elite microreactor shard
fragment_reactor_purple.description: A microreactor equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.
fragment_reactor_purple.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse one of the following elite microreactor types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, Arc.

fragment_reactor5_purple.name: Elite Microreactor Shard (Altered)
fragment_reactor5_purple.description: A microreactor equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.
fragment_reactor5_purple.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse the elite microreactor (Altered)

fragment_exoskeleton_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard
fragment_exoskeleton_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides excellent stat support.
fragment_exoskeleton_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse one of the following fortress exoskeleton types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, and Arc.

fragment_exoskeleton1_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Overload)
fragment_exoskeleton1_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides physical support.
fragment_exoskeleton1_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Overload).

fragment_exoskeleton2_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Glaze)
fragment_exoskeleton2_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides frost support.
fragment_exoskeleton2_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Glaze).

fragment_exoskeleton3_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Burst)
fragment_exoskeleton3_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides flame support.
fragment_exoskeleton3_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Burst).

fragment_exoskeleton4_orange.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard (Arc)
fragment_exoskeleton4_orange.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides volt support.
fragment_exoskeleton4_orange.source: Collect 40 shards to fuse the fortress exoskeleton (Arc).

fragment_exoskeleton_purple.name: Elite Exoskeleton Shard
fragment_exoskeleton_purple.description: An exoskeleton equipped by District 7 Executors to fight Grayspace Entities.
fragment_exoskeleton_purple.source: Collect 20 shards to fuse one of the following elite exoskeleton types: Overload, Burst, Glaze, and Arc.

Title_1_4_4_5.description: Clear level 15 in the Boundless Realm to unlock.

Title_1_4_4_6.name: Boundless Realm Walker

Title_1_4_4_7.name: Boundless Realm Pioneer

Title_1_1_11_1.description: Title for reaching 100% Confounding Abyss exploration.
