Title_Overseas_1.description: Unlocks by participating in the Live Stream event.

Title_Overseas_2.name: Hykros Observer
Title_Overseas_2.description: A Pioneer who has made outstanding contributions to the promotion of Tower of Fantasy.

Title_Overseas_3.name: Greatest Creator
Title_Overseas_3.description: Unlocked by being selected during the CBT's Submission Event

Mount_016.name: Warcart of Tomorrow
Mount_016.description: Once it accelerates to 888 miles per hour, it can break through the time barrier and go to any time period...
Mount_016.source: Unlock the vehicle Warcart of Tomorrow

imitation_fashion_23.name: Sleek Summer Shade
imitation_fashion_23.description: Even this well-known busy person of Mirroria occasionally enjoys some time off by the exclusive luxury pool.
imitation_fashion_23.source: Unlock the premium Simulacrum Sleek Summer Shade

imitation_fashion_23_w.name: Misty Weave
imitation_fashion_23_w.description: The wind blown by this fan seems cooler than before... Though it may just be the visual effects which make it seem that way?
imitation_fashion_23_w.source: Unlock the weapon appearance Misty Weave

imitation_fashion_23_bag.name: Sleek Summer Shade & Misty Weave
imitation_fashion_23_bag.description: Even this well-known busy person of Mirroria occasionally enjoys some time off by the exclusive luxury pool.
imitation_fashion_23_bag.source: Use to get the premium Simulacrum Sleek Summer Shade and the weapon appearance Misty Weave.

xinghuan.name: Lyra
xinghuan.description: I'm simply following Ms. Maidelin's orders, that's all.

gift_monthcard_autouse_overseas.name: Random monthly pass box
gift_monthcard_autouse_overseas.description: Receive one of the following items at random: Gold nucleus, proof of purchase, random SSR Relic shard box, random SR Relic shard box, weapon battery II, weapon battery III, weapon battery IV, Matrix data pack II, Matrix data pack III, and Matrix data pack IV.

MapRadar.name: Radar detector
MapRadar.description: The latest radar detector developed by the Mirroria Science and Technology Department. An essential tool for Wanderers.
MapRadar.source: Use to randomly detect an undiscovered World Exploration point, supply pod, Grayspace spatial rift, Grayspace crystal dust, Twilight Zone Secret Box, or Twilight Zone Spacetime Crystal, and generate and record the location's navigation mark.

MapRadarPoint.name: Navigation Beacon
MapRadarPoint.description: A complimentary device to the radar detector. The only choice for Wanderers.
MapRadarPoint.source: Used to display exploration point coordinates.

RoleVoicePackage_1.name: Basic Executor Voice Pack
RoleVoicePackage_1.source: That introvert of an Executor is way chattier than before!?

Mount_017_a.name: Nova Engine
Mount_017_a.description: Don't underestimate its horsepower based on its cute appearance!
Mount_017_a.source: Used to unlock the Nova vehicle.

Mount_017_b.name: Nova Base
Mount_017_b.description: A three-wheeled design, stable and safe. Great for travel, food delivery, cargo transportation, and household essentials!
Mount_017_b.source: Used to unlock the Nova vehicle.

Mount_017_c.name: Nova Hull
Mount_017_c.description: I have to admit that this thing looks like a toy, but it's totally a different story on the manual...
Mount_017_c.source: Used to unlock the Nova vehicle.

fragment_Mount_017_c.name: Nova Shard (Carapace)
fragment_Mount_017_c.description: I have to admit that this thing looks like a toy, but it's totally a different story on the manual...
fragment_Mount_017_c.source: Collect 100 shards to fuse Nova (Carapace), which can be used to unlock the vehicle Nova.

Blindbox_EarlySpring_2022_pack.name: Wheel of Light Giftbox
Blindbox_EarlySpring_2022_pack.description: One of the most popular limited-edition giftboxes at the Banges Expo. It's always a mixture of anticipation and trepidation when you open the box.
Blindbox_EarlySpring_2022_pack.source:
Random box.
Extremely low chance of obtaining one of the Meteoric line of vehicles: Justice Meteor, Nightfeather Meteor, Med Meteor, Rockin' Meteor, Pouncing Cat Meteor, Arena Meteor, Absconder Meteor, Smoothie Meteor, Wishing Meteor, Modular Meteor, Supercomputing Meteor, Frosty Meteor, Snow Rose Meteor, EM Meteor, Glowing Meteor, Windrunner Meteor, Freedom Meteor, Electrovision Meteor, Neon Meteor, Surveyor Meteor, Scuba Meteor, Steady Meteor, Flame Chaser Meteor, Roaming Meteor, Phantasmic Meteor, Inspirational Meteor, DIY Meteor, Reminiscent Meteor, Miraculous Meteor
Low chance of obtaining: [Outfit] Midnight, [Outfit] Early Sakura, [Accessory] Demon Holiday, [Accessory] Demon Devotee, [Accessory] Kiss of Stars, [Avatar Frame] Companion, [Chat Bubble] Type-5.

choose_elemine_p1_pack.name: Elemental Ore Shard Box
choose_elemine_p1_pack.description: A box containing a selection of elemental ore shards to choose from.
choose_elemine_p1_pack.source: Choose any piece of elemental ore shard in the box.

tianlang.name: Sirius
tianlang.description: I am the owner of the Mirroria Nursery. Don't spill the beans on my alter ego!

Avatar36.name: End-Track
Avatar36.description: Ride like the wind! Passion is forever young.

AvatarFrame_Overseas_1.name: Greatest Creator
AvatarFrame_Overseas_1.description: Limited reward for outstanding creators during the CBT.

AvatarFrame_Overseas_2.name: Illusory Link
AvatarFrame_Overseas_2.description: Do we exist, or are we just shadows of some parallel universe?

AvatarFrame_tencent_1.name: Creatower
AvatarFrame_tencent_1.description: An outstanding ToF creator. We can tell you love the game!

AvatarFrame_tencent_2.name: Creatower Master
AvatarFrame_tencent_2.description: An extremely professional ToF creator. ToF is grateful to have an inspiration like you!

AvatarFrame_tencent_3.name: Creatower of Fantasy
AvatarFrame_tencent_3.description: A fantastical ToF creator, one who is already one with the team... You are already one with the team, congrats!

Avatar_Overseas_1.name: Zeke: Awakening
Avatar_Overseas_1.description: Maybe ol' Zeke can even be cute sometimes?

Avatar_Overseas_2.name: Shirli: Awakening
Avatar_Overseas_2.description: "Do I look silly to you when I smile?" Some dumb cute girl said so while swinging her fists.

Avatar_korea_1.name: Mi-a: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_1.description: Mi-a is currently executing the dressing sequence, please wait.

Avatar_korea_2.name: Nemesis: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_2.description: I think I had a dream. I saw a lot of things in this dream.

Avatar_korea_3.name: Shirli: Cute Version
Avatar_korea_3.description: Do we wanna go to Cetus Island together?

matrix_show_SSR1_OS.name: Meryl: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR1_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: If HP is less than 30% after being attacked, gain a shield equal to 20%/26%/32%/40% of Max HP for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds.
Four-set bonus: Increase Whirlwind's damage by 36%/45%/54%/63% and restore HP equal to 30%/38%/44%/50% of the damage dealt while Whirlwind is active. The maximum HP restored every 0.5 seconds cannot exceed 60%/72%/81%/90% of ATK.

matrix_show_SSR2_OS.name: Tsubasa: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR2_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase damage dealt by 14%/16%/18%/20% when there are no enemies within 4 meters.
Four-set bonus: Upon a headshot or hitting the target with Icewind Arrow: Piercing Shot, increase ATK by 15%/18%/21%/25% for 8 seconds.

matrix_show_SSR3_OS.name: Cocoritter: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR3_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase the healing capability and healing effect received by 10%/12%/14%/16%.
Four-set bonus: When you or your teammates are healed, increase ATK by 12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% for 6 seconds. (Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.)

matrix_show_SSR4_OS.name: KING: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR4_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: When a target is shattered, grant 8%/10%/12%/14% damage boost for 25 seconds. Only the highest set effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.
Four-set bonus: If there are 2 or more enemies, hits restore HP equal to 14%/18%/22%/26%, not exceeding 36%/42%/48%/54% of ATK every 0.5 seconds.

matrix_show_SSR5_OS.name: Cobalt-B: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR5_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase damage against debuffed targets by 14%/16%/18%/20%.
Four-set bonus: Grant 1 dodge attempt every 3 dodges. Dodge skills inflict burn upon hit, dealing damage equal to 24%/30%/36%/42% of ATK every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds. (Multiple instances of the dodge skill burn will only trigger damage the first time.)

matrix_show_SSR6_OS.name: Claudia: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR6_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase damage by 13%/17%/20%/23% when hitting a target in mid-air or initiating an aerial attack. Reset double-jump upon hitting the target in mid-air.
Four-set bonus: Hitting an enemy with a skill reduces the cooldowns of all weapon skills by 1.5/2/2.5/3 seconds and increases the damage of discharge skills by 58%/80%/103%/126% for 15 seconds.

matrix_show_SSR7_OS.name: Shiro: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR7_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase both damage and shatter to targets with more than 50% HP by 15%/19%/22.5%/26%.
Four-set bonus: Upon entering battle, gain a 20%/25%/30%/35% damage boost for 35 seconds. Reset 5 seconds after exiting battle.

matrix_show_SSR8_OS.name: Zero: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR8_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Upon using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon, gain a shield equal to 150%/200%/250%/300% of ATK for 6 seconds.
Four-set bonus: While the shield is active, you and your teammates deal 16%/20%/24%/28% more damage.

matrix_show_SSR9_OS.name: Samir: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR9_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase damage progressively by 1% upon hitting a target. Stack up to 10/13/16/20 times. Last for 1.5 seconds.
Four-set bonus: Increase the volt and crit damage of Dual EM Stars by 16%/22%/30%/40%.

matrix_show_SSR10_OS.name: Huma: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR10_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Hitting targets with dodge skills inflicts bleed, dealing damage equal to 15%/19%/22.5%/26% of ATK every second for 5 seconds.
Four-set bonus: Reduce ATK of all targets within 8 meters that are taking damage over time by 10%/12%/13%/15%. (Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.)

matrix_show_SSR11_OS.name: Crow: Matrix
matrix_show_SSR11_OS.source:
Two-set bonus: Increase crit damage to targets with less than 60% HP by 24%/30%/36%/42%.
Four-set bonus: Crits deal additional damage over time equal to 18%/22%/26%/30% of ATK every second for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

Title_1_1_10_2.name: Mirroria Pathfinder
Title_1_1_10_2.description: Title for reaching 100% Mirroria Zone B exploration.

Title_1_1_10_3.name: Mirroria Navigator
Title_1_1_10_3.description: Title for reaching 100% Mirroria Zone C exploration.

Item_gift_T101008.name: A Screenwriter's Blog
Item_gift_T101008.description: A book that contains the screenwriter's personal experiences. Due to its incredible ability to put its readers to sleep, some use it as a sleeping aid.

Item_gift_T101010.name: Security Force Training Diary
Item_gift_T101010.description: A training manual for special agents of the Security Force. It contains training methods shared by senior members, making it a must-read for new members.

Item_gift_T101015.name: Rider Postcard
Item_gift_T101015.description: A postcard signed by a famous rider.
